2934  else if(dropSet->ConditionsCount() > 0)
2935  {
2936  if(!server->GetEventManager()->EvaluateEventConditions(
2937  zone, dropSet->GetConditions(), client))
2938  {
2939  valid = false;
2940  }
2941  }
2942  }
2943 
2944  if(valid)
2945  {
2946  dropSets.push_back(dropSet);
2947  }
2948  }
2949  }
2950 
2951  return dropSets;
2952 }
2953 
2954 std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>> CharacterManager::DetermineDrops(
2955  const std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>>& drops,
2956  int16_t luck, bool minLast)
2957 {
2958  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>> results;
2959  if(drops.size() == 0)
2960  {
2961  return results;
2962  }
2963 
2964  auto sharedConfig = mServer.lock()->GetWorldSharedConfig();
2965  float globalDropBonus = sharedConfig->GetDropRateBonus();
2966  float scalingCap = sharedConfig->GetDropLuckScalingCap();
2967 
2968  for(auto drop : drops)
2969  {
2970  double baseRate = (double)drop->GetRate();
2971  uint32_t dropRate = (uint32_t)(baseRate * 100.0);
2972  if(luck > 0 && scalingCap != 0.f)
2973  {
2974  // Scale drop rates based on luck, more for high drop rates and higher luck.
2975  // Estimates roughly to:
2976  // 75% base -> 76.47% at 10 luck, 87.26% at 30 luck, 100+% at 44+ luck
2977  // 50% base -> 51.83% at 20 luck, 57.05% at 40 luck, 100+% at 114+ luck
2978  // 10% base -> 10.57% at 40 luck, 22.7% at 200 luck, 100+% at 600+ luck
2979  // 1% base -> 3.33% at 300 luck, 6.83% at 500 luck, 12.78% at 750 luck
2980  // 0.1% base -> 0.89% at 600 luck, 1.39% at 800 luck, 1.95% at 999 luck
2981  double deltaDiff = (double)(100.0 - baseRate);
2982  dropRate = (uint32_t)(baseRate * (100.f +
2983  100.f * (float)(((double)luck / 30.0) * 10.0 * (double)luck) /
2984  (1000.0 + 7.0 * (double)luck + (deltaDiff * deltaDiff))));
2985 
2986  // Limit luck scaling based on cap
2987  if(scalingCap > 0.f &&
2988  (float)((double)dropRate / (baseRate * 100.0)) > (1.f + scalingCap))
2989  {
2990  dropRate = (uint32_t)(baseRate * 100.0 * (1.0 + (double)scalingCap));
2991  }
2992  }
2993 
2994  dropRate = (uint32_t)((double)dropRate * (double)(1.f + globalDropBonus));
2995 
2996  if(dropRate >= 10000 || RNG(uint16_t, 1, 10000) <= dropRate ||
2997  (minLast && results.size() == 0 && drops.back() == drop))
2998  {
2999  results.push_back(drop);
3000  }
3001  }
3002 
3003  return results;
3004 }
3005 
3006 bool CharacterManager::CreateLootFromDrops(const std::shared_ptr<objects::LootBox>& box,
3007  const std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>>& drops, int16_t luck,
3008  bool minLast, float maccaRate, float magRate)
3009 {
3010  auto dSet = DetermineDrops(drops, luck, minLast);
3011  auto lootItems = CreateLootFromDrops(dSet, maccaRate, magRate);
3012 
3013  bool added = false;
3014  if(lootItems.size() > 0)
3015  {
3016  for(size_t i = 0; i < box->LootCount(); i++)
3017  {
3018  if(lootItems.size() > 0)
3019  {
3020  auto loot = lootItems.front();
3021  lootItems.pop_front();
3022  box->SetLoot(i, loot);
3023  added = true;
3024  }
3025  else
3026  {
3027  break;
3028  }
3029  }
3030  }
3031 
3032  return added;
3033 }
3034 
3035 std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Loot>> CharacterManager::CreateLootFromDrops(
3036  const std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::ItemDrop>>& drops,
3037  float maccaRate, float magRate)
3038 {
3039  auto server = mServer.lock();
3040  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3041 
3042  // Loop through the drops and sum up stacks
3043  // Drops can be restricted by active cooldown so make sure not to combine
3044  // two stacks with differing cooldown restrictions
3045  std::unordered_map<uint32_t,
3046  std::unordered_map<int32_t, uint32_t>> itemStacks;
3047  for(auto drop : drops)
3048  {
3049  uint16_t minStack = drop->GetMinStack();
3050  uint16_t maxStack = drop->GetMaxStack();
3051 
3052  // The drop rate is affected by luck but the stack size is not
3053  int32_t stackSize = (int32_t)RNG(uint16_t, minStack, maxStack);
3054  if(maccaRate != 1.f && drop->GetItemType() == SVR_CONST.ITEM_MACCA)
3055  {
3056  stackSize = (int32_t)floor((float)stackSize * maccaRate);
3057  }
3058  else if(magRate != 1.f &&
3059  drop->GetItemType() == SVR_CONST.ITEM_MAGNETITE)
3060  {
3061  stackSize = (int32_t)floor((float)stackSize * magRate);
3062  }
3063 
3064  if(stackSize <= 0)
3065  {
3066  continue;
3067  }
3068 
3069  int32_t rGroup = drop->GetCooldownRestrict();
3070 
3071  auto& subset = itemStacks[drop->GetItemType()];
3072  auto it = subset.find(rGroup);
3073  if(it != subset.end())
3074  {
3075  it->second = it->second + (uint32_t)stackSize;
3076  }
3077  else
3078  {
3079  subset[rGroup] = (uint32_t)stackSize;
3080  }
3081  }
3082 
3083  // Loop back through and create the items with the combined stacks
3084  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Loot>> lootItems;
3085  for(auto drop : drops)
3086  {
3087  int32_t rGroup = drop->GetCooldownRestrict();
3088 
3089  auto& subset = itemStacks[drop->GetItemType()];
3090 
3091  auto it = subset.find(rGroup);
3092  if(it != subset.end())
3093  {
3094  uint32_t stackSize = it->second;
3095 
3096  // Remove it from the set so its not generated twice
3097  subset.erase(it);
3098 
3099  auto itemDef = definitionManager->GetItemData(
3100  drop->GetItemType());
3101  if(!itemDef)
3102  {
3103  LogCharacterManagerError([&]()
3104  {
3105  return libcomp::String("Attempted to create a drop from"
3106  " an invalid item type: %1\n").Arg(drop->GetItemType());
3107  });
3108 
3109  continue;
3110  }
3111 
3112  uint16_t maxStackSize = itemDef->GetPossession()->GetStackSize();
3113  uint16_t stackCount = (uint8_t)ceill((double)stackSize /
3114  (double)maxStackSize);
3115 
3116  for(uint16_t i = 0; i < stackCount; i++)
3117  {
3118  uint16_t stack = stackSize <= (uint32_t)maxStackSize
3119  ? (uint16_t)stackSize : maxStackSize;
3120  stackSize = (uint32_t)(stackSize - (uint32_t)stack);
3121 
3122  auto loot = std::make_shared<objects::Loot>();
3123  loot->SetType(drop->GetItemType());
3124  loot->SetCount(stack);
3125  loot->SetCooldownRestrict(rGroup);
3126  lootItems.push_back(loot);
3127  }
3128  }
3129  }
3130 
3131  return lootItems;
3132 }
3133 
3134 void CharacterManager::SendLootItemData(const std::list<std::shared_ptr<
3135  ChannelClientConnection>>& clients, const std::shared_ptr<LootBoxState>& lState,
3136  bool queue)
3137 {
3138  auto lootBox = lState->GetEntity();
3139 
3140  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, int32_t> restrictions;
3141 
3142  libcomp::Packet p;
3143  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_LOOT_ITEM_DATA);
3144  p.WriteS32Little(0); // Entity ID (written later)
3145  p.WriteS32Little(lState->GetEntityID());
3146  p.WriteFloat(0.f); // Loot time (written later)
3147 
3148  for(auto loot : lootBox->GetLoot())
3149  {
3150  if(loot && loot->GetCount() > 0)
3151  {
3152  p.WriteU32Little(loot->GetType());
3153  p.WriteU16Little(loot->GetCount());
3154 
3155  if(loot->GetCooldownRestrict())
3156  {
3157  restrictions[p.Size()] = loot->GetCooldownRestrict();
3158  p.WriteS8(0); // Set restricted access later
3159  }
3160  else
3161  {
3162  // Not restricted
3163  p.WriteS8(3);
3164  }
3165  }
3166  else
3167  {
3168  p.WriteU32Little(static_cast<uint32_t>(-1));
3169  p.WriteU16Little(0);
3170  p.WriteS8(0);
3171  }
3172  }
3173 
3174  for(auto client : clients)
3175  {
3176  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3177  if(lootBox->ValidLooterIDsCount() == 0 ||
3178  lootBox->ValidLooterIDsContains(state->GetWorldCID()))
3179  {
3180  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
3181 
3182  p.Seek(2);
3183  p.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
3184  p.Seek(10);
3185  p.WriteFloat(state->ToClientTime(lootBox->GetLootTime()));
3186 
3187  if(restrictions.size() > 0)
3188  {
3189  cState->RefreshActionCooldowns(false);
3190  for(auto& pair : restrictions)
3191  {
3192  p.Seek(pair.first);
3193  if(cState->ActionCooldownActive(pair.second, false,
3194  false))
3195  {
3196  p.WriteS8(3); // Lootable
3197  }
3198  else
3199  {
3200  p.WriteS8(0); // Restricted
3201  }
3202  }
3203  }
3204 
3205  if(queue)
3206  {
3207  client->QueuePacketCopy(p);
3208  }
3209  else
3210  {
3211  client->SendPacketCopy(p);
3212  }
3213  }
3214  }
3215 }
3216 
3217 void CharacterManager::EquipItem(const std::shared_ptr<
3218  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int64_t itemID)
3219 {
3220  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3221  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
3222  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
3223  auto equip = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Item>(
3224  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(
3225  state->GetObjectUUID(itemID)));
3226 
3227  if(nullptr == equip)
3228  {
3229  return;
3230  }
3231 
3232  bool inInventory = equip->GetItemBox() == character->GetItemBoxes(0).GetUUID();
3233 
3234  auto slot = objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_NONE;
3235 
3236  auto server = mServer.lock();
3237  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3238  auto def = definitionManager->GetItemData(equip->GetType());
3239  if (nullptr != def)
3240  {
3241  slot = def->GetBasic()->GetEquipType();
3242  }
3243 
3244  if(slot == objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_NONE)
3245  {
3246  return;
3247  }
3248 
3249  uint8_t stockCount = cState->GetMaxFusionGaugeStocks();
3250 
3251  bool unequip = false;
3252  auto equipSlot = character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)slot);
3253  if(equipSlot.Get() == equip)
3254  {
3255  // Unequip from anywhere
3256  equipSlot.SetReference(nullptr);
3257  unequip = true;
3258 
3259  // If mounted and this is a ring, cancel mount
3260  if(slot == objects::MiItemBasicData::EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_RING &&
3261  cState->IsMounted())
3262  {
3263  CancelMount(state);
3264  }
3265  }
3266  else if(!inInventory)
3267  {
3268  // Only equip from inventory
3269  return;
3270  }
3271  else
3272  {
3273  equipSlot.SetReference(equip);
3274  }
3275 
3276  character->SetEquippedItems((size_t)slot, equipSlot);
3277 
3278  // Determine which complete sets are equipped now
3279  cState->RecalcEquipState(definitionManager);
3280 
3281  // Recalculate tokusei and stats to reflect equipment changes
3282  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true,
3283  std::set<int32_t>{ cState->GetEntityID() });
3284  RecalculateStats(cState, client, false);
3285 
3286  libcomp::Packet reply;
3287  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_EQUIPMENT_CHANGED);
3288  reply.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
3289  reply.WriteU8((uint8_t)slot);
3290 
3291  if(unequip)
3292  {
3293  reply.WriteS64Little(-1);
3294  reply.WriteU32Little(static_cast<uint32_t>(-1));
3295  }
3296  else
3297  {
3298  reply.WriteS64Little(state->GetObjectID(equip->GetUUID()));
3299  reply.WriteU32Little(equip->GetType());
3300  }
3301 
3302  auto cs = character->GetCoreStats().Get();
3303  GetEntityStatsPacketData(reply, cs, cState, 2);
3304 
3305  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(character, state->GetAccountUID());
3306 
3307  client->SendPacket(reply);
3308 
3309  // Now update the other players
3310  reply.Clear();
3311  reply.WritePacketCode(
3312  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_OTHER_CHARACTER_EQUIPMENT_CHANGED);
3313  reply.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
3314  reply.WriteU8((uint8_t)slot);
3315 
3316  if(unequip)
3317  {
3318  reply.WriteU32Little(static_cast<uint32_t>(-1));
3319  }
3320  else
3321  {
3322  reply.WriteU32Little(equip->GetType());
3323  }
3324 
3325  reply.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cState->GetMaxHP());
3326  reply.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cState->GetMaxMP());
3327 
3328  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, reply, false);
3329 
3330  // If the stock count changed notify the client
3331  if(stockCount != cState->GetMaxFusionGaugeStocks())
3332  {
3333  stockCount = cState->GetMaxFusionGaugeStocks();
3334  if(character->GetFusionGauge() > (uint32_t)(stockCount * 10000))
3335  {
3336  // Reset to max
3337  character->SetFusionGauge((uint32_t)(stockCount * 10000));
3338  }
3339 
3340  SendFusionGauge(client);
3341  }
3342 }
3343 
3344 bool CharacterManager::UnequipItem(const std::shared_ptr<
3345  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
3346  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>& item)
3347 {
3348  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3349  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
3350  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
3351 
3352  auto server = mServer.lock();
3353  auto def = server->GetDefinitionManager()->GetItemData(item->GetType());
3354  if(def)
3355  {
3356  int8_t equipType = (int8_t)def->GetBasic()->GetEquipType();
3357  if(equipType >= 0 &&
3358  character->GetEquippedItems((size_t)equipType).Get() == item)
3359  {
3360  auto objID = state->GetObjectID(item->GetUUID());
3361  EquipItem(client, objID);
3362  return true;
3363  }
3364  }
3365 
3366  return false;
3367 }
3368 
3369 bool CharacterManager::UpdateDurability(const std::shared_ptr<
3370  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
3371  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>& item, int32_t points,
3372  bool isAdjust, bool updateMax, bool sendPacket)
3373 {
3374  if(!item)
3375  {
3376  return false;
3377  }
3378 
3379  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>, int32_t> items;
3380  items[item] = points;
3381 
3382  return UpdateDurability(client, items, isAdjust, updateMax, sendPacket);
3383 }
3384 
3385 bool CharacterManager::UpdateDurability(const std::shared_ptr<
3386  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
3387  const std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>, int32_t>& items,
3388  bool isAdjust, bool updateMax, bool sendPacket)
3389 {
3390  if(!client || items.size() == 0)
3391  {
3392  return false;
3393  }
3394 
3395  auto server = mServer.lock();
3396 
3397  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3398  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
3399 
3400  // Certain items can increase XP when their visible durability drops
3401  bool decayXP = !updateMax && cState->GetCalculatedState()
3402  ->ExistingTokuseiAspectsContains((int8_t)
3403  TokuseiAspectType::EQUIP_DECAY_XP);
3404  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, std::set<int32_t>> decayTokusei;
3405 
3406  bool recalc = false;
3407  bool updated = false;
3408  for(auto itemPair : items)
3409  {
3410  auto item = itemPair.first;
3411  int32_t points = itemPair.second;
3412 
3413  auto itemData = server->GetDefinitionManager()
3414  ->GetItemData(item->GetType());
3415 
3416  // Rental items do not functionally have durability
3417  if(!itemData || itemData->GetRental()->GetRental()) continue;
3418 
3419  bool update = false;
3420  if(updateMax)
3421  {
3422  int8_t current = item->GetMaxDurability();
3423 
3424  int32_t maxDurability = (int32_t)itemData->GetPossession()
3425  ->GetDurability();
3426 
3427  int32_t newValue = isAdjust ? (current + points) : points;
3428  if(newValue < 0)
3429  {
3430  newValue = 0;
3431  }
3432  else if(newValue > maxDurability)
3433  {
3434  newValue = maxDurability;
3435  }
3436 
3437  if(newValue == 0)
3438  {
3439  // Item is broken, remove it
3440  LogItemDebug([item, cState]()
3441  {
3442  return libcomp::String("Item type %1 owned by character"
3443  " %2 has broken.\n").Arg(item->GetType())
3444  .Arg(cState->GetEntityUUID().ToString());
3445  });
3446 
3447  UnequipItem(client, item);
3448  item->SetDurability(0);
3449  item->SetMaxDurability(0);
3450 
3451  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>> empty;
3452  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<
3453  objects::Item>, uint16_t> updateItems;
3454  updateItems[item] = 0;
3455 
3456  return UpdateItems(client, false, empty, updateItems);
3457  }
3458  else if(newValue != (int32_t)current)
3459  {
3460  // Max durability reduced
3461  item->SetMaxDurability((int8_t)newValue);
3462 
3463  // Reduce current durability if higher than new max
3464  if(item->GetDurability() > (uint16_t)(newValue * 1000))
3465  {
3466  item->SetDurability((uint16_t)(newValue * 1000));
3467  }
3468  else if(newValue > (int32_t)current)
3469  {
3470  // Increase the current durability by the proportional amount
3471  uint16_t durability = item->GetDurability();
3472  item->SetDurability((uint16_t)(durability +
3473  (newValue - current) * 1000));
3474  }
3475 
3476  // Always update when changing max durability
3477  update = true;
3478  }
3479  }
3480  else
3481  {
3482  uint16_t current = item->GetDurability();
3483 
3484  if(points < 0 && current == 0)
3485  {
3486  // Cannot reduce further
3487  return false;
3488  }
3489 
3490  int32_t newValue = isAdjust ? (current + points) : points;
3491  if(newValue < 0)
3492  {
3493  newValue = 0;
3494  }
3495  else if(newValue > item->GetMaxDurability() * 1000)
3496  {
3497  newValue = (item->GetMaxDurability() * 1000);
3498  }
3499 
3500  if(newValue != (int32_t)current)
3501  {
3502  item->SetDurability((uint16_t)newValue);
3503 
3504  if(ceil(newValue * 0.001) != ceil(current * 0.001))
3505  {
3506  //Only update if the visible durability changes
3507  update = true;
3508 
3509  // Check if the item is equipped
3510  if(cState->GetEntity()->GetEquippedItems((size_t)itemData
3511  ->GetBasic()->GetEquipType()).Get() == item)
3512  {
3513  // If changing to/from 0, reclaculate stats and tokusei
3514  recalc = (newValue == 0) != (current == 0);
3515 
3516  if(newValue < current && decayXP)
3517  {
3518  for(int32_t tokuseiID : server->GetDefinitionManager()
3519  ->GetSItemTokusei(item->GetType()))
3520  {
3521  decayTokusei[item->GetType()].insert(tokuseiID);
3522  }
3523  }
3524 
3525  if(newValue == 0 && itemData->GetBasic()
3526  ->GetEquipType() == objects::MiItemBasicData::
3527  EquipType_t::EQUIP_TYPE_RING && cState->IsMounted())
3528  {
3529  // Mount ring broken
3530  CancelMount(state);
3531  }
3532  }
3533  }
3534  }
3535  }
3536 
3537  if(update)
3538  {
3539  if(sendPacket)
3540  {
3541  auto itemBox = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::ItemBox>(
3542  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(item->GetItemBox()));
3543  if(itemBox)
3544  {
3545  SendItemBoxData(client, itemBox,
3546  { (uint16_t)item->GetBoxSlot() });
3547  }
3548  }
3549 
3550  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(item, state->GetAccountUID());
3551 
3552  updated = true;
3553  }
3554  }
3555 
3556  if(decayTokusei.size() > 0 && cState->GetLevel() < server
3557  ->GetWorldSharedConfig()->GetLevelCap())
3558  {
3559  // Grant XP from item decay based on current level
3560  int32_t level = (int32_t)cState->GetLevel();
3561  for(auto& pair : decayTokusei)
3562  {
3563  int32_t xp = 0;
3564  for(int32_t tokuseiID : pair.second)
3565  {
3566  auto tokusei = server->GetDefinitionManager()->GetTokuseiData(
3567  tokuseiID);
3568  for(auto aspect : tokusei->GetAspects())
3569  {
3570  if(aspect->GetType() == TokuseiAspectType::EQUIP_DECAY_XP &&
3571  aspect->GetModifier() <= level)
3572  {
3573  xp = xp + aspect->GetValue();
3574  }
3575  }
3576  }
3577 
3578  if(xp > 0)
3579  {
3580  libcomp::Packet p;
3581  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_ITEM_XP);
3582  p.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
3583  p.WriteS32Little(xp);
3584  p.WriteU32Little(pair.first);
3585 
3586  client->QueuePacket(p);
3587 
3588  UpdateExperience(client, xp, cState->GetEntityID());
3589  }
3590  }
3591  }
3592 
3593  if(recalc)
3594  {
3595  // Enable/disable tokusei on equipment including set bonuses
3596  cState->RecalcEquipState(server->GetDefinitionManager());
3597  RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(cState, client);
3598  }
3599 
3600  return updated;
3601 }
3602 
3603 bool CharacterManager::IsCPItem(const std::shared_ptr<
3604  objects::MiItemData>& itemData)
3605 {
3606  return itemData && (itemData->GetBasic()->GetFlags() & ITEM_FLAG_CP) != 0;
3607 }
3608 
3609 void CharacterManager::EndExchange(const std::shared_ptr<
3610  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t outcome)
3611 {
3612  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3613  auto exchange = state->GetExchangeSession();
3614 
3615  if(exchange)
3616  {
3617  switch(exchange->GetType())
3618  {
3619  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::TRADE:
3620  {
3621  libcomp::Packet p;
3622  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_TRADE_ENDED);
3623  p.WriteS32Little(outcome);
3624 
3625  client->QueuePacket(p);
3626  }
3627  break;
3628  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::CRYSTALLIZE:
3629  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::ENCHANT_SOUL:
3630  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::ENCHANT_TAROT:
3631  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::SYNTH_MELEE:
3632  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::SYNTH_GUN:
3633  {
3634  libcomp::Packet p;
3635  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_ENTRUST_FINISH);
3636  p.WriteS32Little(outcome);
3637 
3638  client->QueuePacket(p);
3639  }
3640  break;
3641  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::TRIFUSION_GUEST:
3642  case objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::TRIFUSION_HOST:
3643  mServer.lock()->GetFusionManager()->EndExchange(client);
3644  return;
3645  default:
3646  break;
3647  }
3648 
3649  state->SetExchangeSession(nullptr);
3650  SetStatusIcon(client, 0);
3651 
3652  client->FlushOutgoing();
3653  }
3654 }
3655 
3656 void CharacterManager::UpdateLNC(const std::shared_ptr<
3657  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int16_t lnc)
3658 {
3659  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3660  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
3661  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
3662 
3663  if(lnc > 10000)
3664  {
3665  lnc = 10000;
3666  }
3667  else if(lnc < -10000)
3668  {
3669  lnc = -10000;
3670  }
3671 
3672  character->SetLNC(lnc);
3673 
3674  auto server = mServer.lock();
3675  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(character, state->GetAccountUID());
3676 
3677  libcomp::Packet reply;
3678  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_LNC_POINTS);
3679  reply.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
3680  reply.WriteS16Little(character->GetLNC());
3681 
3682  client->SendPacket(reply);
3683 
3684  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
3685  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> { TokuseiConditionType::LNC });
3686 }
3687 
3688 std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon> CharacterManager::ContractDemon(
3689  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
3690  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData>& demonData,
3691  int32_t sourceEntityID, uint16_t familiarity)
3692 {
3693  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3694  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
3695  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
3696 
3697  auto demon = ContractDemon(character, demonData, familiarity);
3698 
3699  if(!demon)
3700  {
3701  LogCharacterManagerErrorMsg("Failed to contract demon!\n");
3702 
3703  return {};
3704  }
3705 
3706  auto demonID = mServer.lock()->GetNextObjectID();
3707  state->SetObjectID(demon->GetUUID(), demonID);
3708 
3709  if(sourceEntityID != 0)
3710  {
3711  libcomp::Packet p;
3712  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_CONTRACT_COMPLETED);
3713  p.WriteS32Little(sourceEntityID);
3714  p.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
3715 
3716  mServer.lock()->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, p);
3717  }
3718 
3719  int8_t slot = demon->GetBoxSlot();
3720  SendDemonData(client, 0, slot, demonID);
3721 
3722  return demon;
3723 }
3724 
3725 std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon> CharacterManager::ContractDemon(
3726  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Character>& character,
3727  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData>& demonData,
3728  uint16_t familiarity)
3729 {
3730  auto comp = character->GetCOMP().Get();
3731  auto progress = character->GetProgress();
3732 
3733  //Find the next empty slot to add the demon to
3734  int8_t compSlot = -1;
3735  size_t maxCompSlots = (size_t)progress->GetMaxCOMPSlots();
3736  for(size_t i = 0; i < maxCompSlots; i++)
3737  {
3738  if(comp->GetDemons(i).IsNull())
3739  {
3740  compSlot = (int8_t)i;
3741  break;
3742  }
3743  }
3744 
3745  //Return false if no slot is open
3746  if(compSlot == -1)
3747  {
3748  LogCharacterManagerErrorMsg("No free slot to contract demon.\n");
3749 
3750  return nullptr;
3751  }
3752 
3753  auto d = GenerateDemon(demonData, familiarity);
3754  if(!d)
3755  {
3756  LogCharacterManagerErrorMsg("Failed to generate demon.\n");
3757 
3758  return nullptr;
3759  }
3760 
3761  auto ds = d->GetCoreStats().Get();
3762 
3763  d->SetDemonBox(comp->GetUUID());
3764  d->SetBoxSlot(compSlot);
3765 
3766  comp->SetDemons((size_t)compSlot, d);
3767 
3768  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(
3769  character->GetAccount());
3770  dbChanges->Insert(d);
3771  dbChanges->Insert(ds);
3772  dbChanges->Update(comp);
3773 
3774  auto server = mServer.lock();
3775  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
3776 
3777  return d;
3778 }
3779 
3780 std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon> CharacterManager::GenerateDemon(
3781  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData>& demonData,
3782  uint16_t familiarity)
3783 {
3784  if(nullptr == demonData)
3785  {
3786  return nullptr;
3787  }
3788 
3789  //Create a new demon from it's defaults
3790  auto growth = demonData->GetGrowth();
3791 
3792  auto server = mServer.lock();
3793  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3794 
3795  auto d = libcomp::PersistentObject::New<
3796  objects::Demon>(true);
3797  d->SetType(demonData->GetBasic()->GetID());
3798  d->SetGrowthType(demonData->GetGrowth()->GetGrowthType());
3799  d->SetFamiliarity(familiarity);
3800 
3801  // Default all skill types to "on" as well as same target attack
3802  d->SetAttackSettings(0xFFFF);
3803 
3804  int8_t level = (int8_t)growth->GetBaseLevel();
3805 
3806  // Don't create over max level, even if base is higher
3807  int8_t levelCap = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()->GetLevelCap();
3808  if(level > levelCap)
3809  {
3810  level = levelCap;
3811  }
3812 
3813  auto ds = libcomp::PersistentObject::New<
3814  objects::EntityStats>(true);
3815  ds->SetLevel(level);
3816  d->SetCoreStats(ds);
3817 
3818  CalculateDemonBaseStats(d);
3819 
3820  // Add learned skills
3821  for(size_t i = 0; i < 8; i++)
3822  {
3823  uint32_t skillID = growth->GetSkills(i);
3824  auto skillData = skillID
3825  ? definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID) : nullptr;
3826  if(skillData &&
3827  skillData->GetCommon()->GetCategory()->GetMainCategory() !=
3828  SKILL_CATEGORY_SWITCH)
3829  {
3830  // Switch skills were never supported by the client when sent
3831  // from partner demons so only add if it is not a switch skill
3832  d->SetLearnedSkills(i, skillID);
3833  }
3834  }
3835 
3836  ds->SetEntity(d->GetUUID());
3837 
3838  return d;
3839 }
3840 
3841 bool CharacterManager::ReunionDemon(
3842  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection> client, int64_t demonID,
3843  uint8_t growthType, uint32_t costItemType, bool replyToClient, bool force,
3844  int8_t forceRank)
3845 {
3846  if(!force && forceRank >= 0)
3847  {
3848  // Invalid
3849  return false;
3850  }
3851 
3852  auto state = client->GetClientState();
3853  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
3854  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
3855  auto devilData = dState->GetDevilData();
3856 
3857  auto server = mServer.lock();
3858  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
3859 
3860  auto demon = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
3861  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state->GetObjectUUID(demonID)));
3862  auto cs = demon ? demon->GetCoreStats().Get() : nullptr;
3863 
3864  bool success = false;
3865 
3866  auto growthData = definitionManager->GetDevilLVUpRateData(growthType);
3867  if(demon && dState->GetEntity() == demon && devilData &&
3868  growthData && growthData->GetGroupID() >= 1)
3869  {
3870  bool anyItem = false;
3871  bool itemFound = false;
3872  uint16_t itemsRequired = 0;
3873  if(!force)
3874  {
3875  for(auto con : growthData->GetReunionConditions())
3876  {
3877  uint32_t itemType = con->GetItemID();
3878  if(itemType)
3879  {
3880  if(costItemType == itemType)
3881  {
3882  itemsRequired = con->GetAmount();
3883  itemFound = true;
3884  }
3885  anyItem = true;
3886  }
3887  }
3888  }
3889 
3890  size_t groupIdx = (size_t)(growthData->GetGroupID() - 1);
3891  int8_t rank = growthData->GetSubID();
3892  int8_t targetRank = groupIdx < 12 ? demon->GetReunion(groupIdx) : 0;
3893 
3894  auto growthData2 = definitionManager->GetDevilLVUpRateData(
3895  demon->GetGrowthType());
3896  bool isSwitch = growthData2 &&
3897  growthData2->GetGroupID() != growthData->GetGroupID();
3898  bool isReset = devilData->GetGrowth()->GetGrowthType() == growthType;
3899 
3900  success = true;
3901  if(!force)
3902  {
3903  // Valid if an item matched the request item
3904  if(anyItem && !itemFound)
3905  {
3906  success = false;
3907  }
3908  else if(!isReset && targetRank < rank)
3909  {
3910  // If not resetting or changing to a rank already obtained,
3911  // the new rank must either be unset (if switching) or one
3912  // rank above current (if not switching)
3913  if(isSwitch)
3914  {
3915  success = rank == 1 && targetRank == 0;
3916  }
3917  else
3918  {
3919  // Special bypass for switching from default to rank 2
3920  success = (targetRank == (rank - 1) ||
3921  (rank == 2 && targetRank == 0));
3922  }
3923  }
3924  }
3925 
3926  if(!force && success && !isReset && rank > 1)
3927  {
3928  // Base criteria valid, make sure the demon is leveled enough
3929  int8_t lvl = cs->GetLevel();
3930  if(rank >= 9)
3931  {
3932  if(lvl < 99)
3933  {
3934  success = false;
3935  }
3936  }
3937  else if((int8_t)(rank * 10 + 10) > lvl)
3938  {
3939  success = false;
3940  }
3941  }
3942 
3943  if(!force && success)
3944  {
3945  // Pay cost
3946  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>> inserts;
3947  std::unordered_map<std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>, uint16_t> cost;
3948 
3949  uint64_t maccaCost = (uint64_t)((rank > 0 ? rank : 1) * 500 *
3950  cs->GetLevel());
3951  success = CalculateMaccaPayment(client, maccaCost, inserts, cost);
3952 
3953  if(costItemType)
3954  {
3955  success &= CalculateItemRemoval(client, costItemType,
3956  (uint64_t)itemsRequired, cost) == 0;
3957  }
3958 
3959  success &= UpdateItems(client, false, inserts, cost);
3960  }
3961 
3962  if(success)
3963  {
3964  // Update bonuses
3965  if(growthData2 && growthData2->GetGroupID() > 0 && isSwitch && rank)
3966  {
3967  // Make sure the growth type being changed from has at least
3968  // rank 1 unless the new type is non-standard
3969  size_t groupIdx2 = (size_t)(growthData2->GetGroupID() - 1);
3970  if(groupIdx2 < 12 && demon->GetReunion(groupIdx2) == 0)
3971  {
3972  demon->SetReunion(groupIdx2, 1);
3973  }
3974  }
3975 
3976  if(groupIdx < 12)
3977  {
3978  uint8_t max = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
3979  ->GetReunionMax();
3980 
3981  int8_t newRank = targetRank;
3982  if(force)
3983  {
3984  if(forceRank >= 0)
3985  {
3986  newRank = forceRank;
3987  }
3988  }
3989  else if(targetRank < rank)
3990  {
3991  newRank = rank;
3992  }
3993  else if(!isSwitch && targetRank >= 9 && rank == 9 &&
3994  growthType == demon->GetGrowthType())
3995  {
3996  // Setting to normal max again, check if the rank is
3997  // configured to exceed normal max
3998  if((uint8_t)(targetRank + 1) <= max)
3999  {
4000  newRank = (int8_t)(targetRank + 1);
4001  }
4002  }
4003 
4004  if((uint8_t)newRank > max)
4005  {
4006  newRank = (int8_t)max;
4007  }
4008 
4009  demon->SetReunion(groupIdx, newRank);
4010  }
4011 
4012  // Determine new level and stats
4013  int64_t keepXP = 0;
4014  auto effectMap = cState->GetStatusEffects();
4015  auto effectIter = effectMap.find(SVR_CONST.STATUS_REUNION_XP_SAVE);
4016  if(effectIter != effectMap.end())
4017  {
4018  // Keep 1% XP for each stack active then expire the effect
4019  uint8_t stacks = effectIter->second->GetStack();
4020  if(stacks > 100)
4021  {
4022  stacks = 100;
4023  }
4024 
4025  // Sum up existing XP then reduce
4026  int8_t lvl = cs->GetLevel();
4027  keepXP = cs->GetXP();
4028 
4029  for(int8_t i = 1; i < lvl; i++)
4030  {
4031  keepXP = keepXP +
4032  (int64_t)libcomp::LEVEL_XP_REQUIREMENTS[(size_t)i];
4033  }
4034 
4035  keepXP = (int64_t)floorl((double)keepXP * (double)stacks * 0.01);
4036 
4037  std::set<uint32_t> expire = { SVR_CONST.STATUS_REUNION_XP_SAVE };
4038  cState->ExpireStatusEffects(expire);
4039  }
4040 
4041  if(keepXP)
4042  {
4043  // Re-level to the kept XP point
4044  int8_t levelCap = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
4045  ->GetLevelCap();
4046 
4047  int8_t lvl = 1;
4048  while(lvl < levelCap && keepXP > 0)
4049  {
4050  int64_t req = (int64_t)
4051  libcomp::LEVEL_XP_REQUIREMENTS[(size_t)lvl];
4052  if(req <= keepXP)
4053  {
4054  lvl = (int8_t)(lvl + 1);
4055  keepXP = (int64_t)(keepXP - req);
4056  }
4057  else
4058  {
4059  break;
4060  }
4061  }
4062 
4063  if(lvl == levelCap)
4064  {
4065  keepXP = 0;
4066  }
4067 
4068  cs->SetLevel(lvl);
4069  cs->SetXP(keepXP);
4070  }
4071  else
4072  {
4073  // Reset level/XP
4074  cs->SetLevel(1);
4075  cs->SetXP(0);
4076  }
4077 
4078  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(
4079  state->GetAccountUID());
4080 
4081  demon->SetGrowthType(growthType);
4082  CalculateDemonBaseStats(demon);
4083 
4084  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true,
4085  std::set<int32_t>{ dState->GetEntityID() });
4086  RecalculateStats(dState, client, false);
4087 
4088  cs->SetHP(dState->GetMaxHP());
4089  cs->SetMP(dState->GetMaxMP());
4090 
4091  dbChanges->Update(demon);
4092  dbChanges->Update(cs);
4093 
4094  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
4095  }
4096  }
4097 
4098  if(replyToClient)
4099  {
4100  libcomp::Packet reply;
4101  reply.WritePacketCode(
4102  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DEMON_REUNION);
4103  reply.WriteS8(success ? 0 : -1);
4104  reply.WriteS64Little(demonID);
4105  reply.WriteU8(growthType);
4106 
4107  client->QueuePacket(reply);
4108  }
4109 
4110  if(success)
4111  {
4112  libcomp::Packet notify;
4113  notify.WritePacketCode(
4114  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_PARTNER_LEVEL_DOWN);
4115  notify.WriteS32Little(dState->GetEntityID());
4116  notify.WriteS8(cs->GetLevel());
4117  notify.WriteS64Little(cs->GetXP());
4118  GetEntityStatsPacketData(notify, cs, dState, 1);
4119  notify.WriteU8(growthType);
4120 
4121  for(int8_t reunionRank : demon->GetReunion())
4122  {
4123  notify.WriteS8(reunionRank);
4124  }
4125 
4126  notify.WriteS8(CalculateMagReduction(client, demon));
4127 
4128  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, notify);
4129  }
4130 
4131  client->FlushOutgoing();
4132 
4133  return success;
4134 }
4135 
4136 uint16_t CharacterManager::GetReunionRankTotal(
4137  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon> demon)
4138 {
4139  uint16_t rTotal = 0;
4140  for(int8_t rank : demon->GetReunion())
4141  {
4142  // Ranks max at non-expanded cap
4143  if(rank > 8)
4144  {
4145  rank = 8;
4146  }
4147 
4148  rTotal = (uint16_t)(rTotal + rank);
4149  }
4150 
4151  // Set default growth rank to 1 if no points were placed in it
4152  auto definitionManager = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager();
4153  auto demonData = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demon->GetType());
4154  auto defaultGrowthType = demonData ? definitionManager
4155  ->GetDevilLVUpRateData(demonData->GetGrowth()->GetGrowthType())
4156  : nullptr;
4157  if(defaultGrowthType && defaultGrowthType->GetGroupID() > 0 && demon
4158  ->GetReunion((size_t)(defaultGrowthType->GetGroupID() - 1)) == 0)
4159  {
4160  rTotal++;
4161  }
4162 
4163  return rTotal;
4164 }
4165 
4166 bool CharacterManager::MitamaDemon(const std::shared_ptr<
4167  ChannelClientConnection> client, int64_t demonID, uint8_t growthType,
4168  uint8_t mitamaType)
4169 {
4170  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4171 
4172  auto server = mServer.lock();
4173  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
4174 
4175  auto demon = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Demon>(
4176  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(state->GetObjectUUID(demonID)));
4177  auto demonData = demon
4178  ? definitionManager->GetDevilData(demon->GetType()) : nullptr;
4179 
4180  bool success = false;
4181  if(demonData && demonData->GetUnionData()->GetMitamaFusionID())
4182  {
4183  // Calculate mitama rank based on sum of reunion ranks over 48 / 4
4184  uint16_t rTotal = GetReunionRankTotal(demon);
4185  if(rTotal >= 48)
4186  {
4187  uint32_t currentType = demon->GetType();
4188  uint32_t newType = demonData->GetUnionData()->GetMitamaFusionID();
4189 
4190  int8_t mRank = (int8_t)floor((rTotal - 48) / 4);
4191 
4192  demon->SetGrowthType(growthType);
4193  demon->SetType(newType);
4194  demon->SetMitamaRank((uint8_t)mRank);
4195  demon->SetMitamaType(mitamaType);
4196 
4197  success = true;
4198 
4199  LogCharacterManagerDebug([&]()
4200  {
4201  return libcomp::String("Demon type %1 became type %2 with"
4202  " mitama type %3 and growh type %4: %5\n")
4203  .Arg(currentType).Arg(newType)
4204  .Arg(mitamaType).Arg(growthType)
4205  .Arg(demon->GetUUID().ToString());
4206  });
4207  }
4208  }
4209 
4210  return success;
4211 }
4212 
4213 bool CharacterManager::IsMitamaDemon(const std::shared_ptr<
4214  objects::MiDevilData>& devilData)
4215 {
4216  return devilData && (devilData->GetUnionData()
4217  ->GetFusionOptions() & FUSION_OPTION_MITAMA) != 0;
4218 }
4219 
4220 void CharacterManager::ApplyTDamageSpecial(const std::shared_ptr<
4221  ActiveEntityState>& eState)
4222 {
4223  auto dState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<DemonState>(eState);
4224  if(dState)
4225  {
4226  // Apply demon specific effects
4227  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
4228  if(!demon)
4229  {
4230  return;
4231  }
4232 
4233  auto server = mServer.lock();
4234  auto tokuseiManager = server->GetTokuseiManager();
4235 
4236  // Don't bother with familiarity regen if at max already
4237  double fRegen = demon->GetFamiliarity() < MAX_FAMILIARITY
4238  ? tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(dState,
4239  TokuseiAspectType::FAMILIARITY_REGEN) : 0.0;
4240  if(fRegen > 0.0)
4241  {
4242  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()->GetEntityClient(
4243  dState->GetEntityID());
4244  if(client)
4245  {
4246  UpdateFamiliarity(client, (int32_t)fRegen, true);
4247  }
4248  }
4249  }
4250 }
4251 
4252 int8_t CharacterManager::GetFamiliarityRank(uint16_t familiarity)
4253 {
4254  if(familiarity <= 1000)
4255  {
4256  return (familiarity <= 500) ? -3 : -2;
4257  }
4258  else if(familiarity <= 2000)
4259  {
4260  return -1;
4261  }
4262  else if(familiarity == MAX_FAMILIARITY)
4263  {
4264  return 4;
4265  }
4266  else
4267  {
4268  return (int8_t)floor((float)(familiarity - 2001)/2000.f);
4269  }
4270 }
4271 
4272 void CharacterManager::UpdateFamiliarity(const std::shared_ptr<
4273  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t familiarity,
4274  bool isAdjust, bool sendPacket)
4275 {
4276  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4277  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4278  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
4279  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
4280 
4281  if(!demon)
4282  {
4283  return;
4284  }
4285 
4286  uint16_t current = demon->GetFamiliarity();
4287  int32_t newFamiliarity = isAdjust ? 0 : (int32_t)familiarity;
4288  if(isAdjust && familiarity != 0)
4289  {
4290  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
4291 
4292  // Since familiarity rate adjustments cannot be bound to
4293  // skills, scale all incoming adjustments here
4294  bool up = familiarity > 0;
4295  auto type = up ? TokuseiAspectType::FAMILIARITY_UP_RATE
4296  : TokuseiAspectType::FAMILIARITY_DOWN_RATE;
4297 
4298  // Pull rate adjustments from character and demon
4299  double multiply = up ? 0.01 : -0.01;
4300  double rateAdjust = 1.0 +
4301  (tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(cState, type) * multiply) +
4302  (tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(dState, type) * multiply);
4303  if(rateAdjust < 0.0)
4304  {
4305  familiarity = 0;
4306  }
4307  else if(rateAdjust != 1.0)
4308  {
4309  familiarity = (int32_t)((double)familiarity * rateAdjust);
4310  }
4311 
4312  newFamiliarity = current + familiarity;
4313  }
4314 
4315  if(newFamiliarity > MAX_FAMILIARITY)
4316  {
4317  newFamiliarity = MAX_FAMILIARITY;
4318  }
4319 
4320  if(newFamiliarity < 0)
4321  {
4322  newFamiliarity = 0;
4323  }
4324 
4325  if(current != (uint16_t)newFamiliarity)
4326  {
4327  auto server = mServer.lock();
4328 
4329  int8_t oldRank = GetFamiliarityRank(current);
4330  int8_t newRank = GetFamiliarityRank((uint16_t)newFamiliarity);
4331 
4332  demon->SetFamiliarity((uint16_t)newFamiliarity);
4333 
4334  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState,
4335  std::set<TokuseiConditionType> { TokuseiConditionType::PARTNER_FAMILIARITY });
4336 
4337  // Rank adjustments will change base stats
4338  if(oldRank != newRank)
4339  {
4340  CalculateDemonBaseStats(dState->GetEntity(), nullptr, nullptr, false);
4341  RecalculateStats(dState, client);
4342 
4343  // Only update the DB and clients if the rank changed
4344  if(sendPacket)
4345  {
4346  libcomp::Packet p;
4347  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DEMON_FAMILIARITY_UPDATE);
4348  p.WriteS32Little(dState->GetEntityID());
4349  p.WriteU16Little((uint16_t)newFamiliarity);
4350 
4351  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, p);
4352  }
4353 
4354  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(demon, state->GetAccountUID());
4355  }
4356  }
4357 }
4358 
4359 int32_t CharacterManager::UpdateSoulPoints(const std::shared_ptr<
4360  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t points,
4361  bool isAdjust, bool applyRate)
4362 {
4363  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4364  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4365  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
4366  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
4367 
4368  if(!demon)
4369  {
4370  return 0;
4371  }
4372 
4373  int32_t current = demon->GetSoulPoints();
4374  int32_t newPoints = isAdjust ? 0 : (int32_t)points;
4375  if(isAdjust && points != 0)
4376  {
4377  if(applyRate && points > 0)
4378  {
4379  auto tokuseiManager = mServer.lock()->GetTokuseiManager();
4380 
4381  auto type = TokuseiAspectType::SOUL_POINT_RATE;
4382  double rateAdjust = 1.0 +
4383  (tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(cState, type) * 0.01) +
4384  (tokuseiManager->GetAspectSum(dState, type) * 0.01);
4385  if(rateAdjust < 0.0)
4386  {
4387  // Do not decrease
4388  points = 0;
4389  }
4390  else if(rateAdjust != 1.0)
4391  {
4392  points = (int32_t)((double)points * rateAdjust);
4393  }
4394  }
4395 
4396  newPoints = current + points;
4397  }
4398 
4399  if(newPoints > MAX_SOUL_POINTS)
4400  {
4401  newPoints = MAX_SOUL_POINTS;
4402  }
4403 
4404  if(newPoints < 0)
4405  {
4406  newPoints = 0;
4407  }
4408 
4409  if(current != newPoints)
4410  {
4411  auto server = mServer.lock();
4412 
4413  demon->SetSoulPoints(newPoints);
4414 
4415  libcomp::Packet p;
4416  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SOUL_POINT_UPDATE);
4417  p.WriteS32Little(dState->GetEntityID());
4418  p.WriteS32Little(newPoints);
4419 
4420  client->SendPacket(p);
4421 
4422  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(demon, state->GetAccountUID());
4423  }
4424 
4425  return points;
4426 }
4427 
4428 void CharacterManager::UpdateFusionGauge(const std::shared_ptr<
4429  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t points, bool isAdjust)
4430 {
4431  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4432  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4433  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4434 
4435  int32_t current = (int32_t)character->GetFusionGauge();
4436  int32_t newPoints = isAdjust ? current + points : points;
4437  uint8_t maxStocks = cState->GetMaxFusionGaugeStocks();
4438 
4439  if(newPoints > (int32_t)(maxStocks * 10000))
4440  {
4441  newPoints = (int32_t)(maxStocks * 10000);
4442  }
4443 
4444  if(newPoints < 0 || !HasValuable(character,
4445  SVR_CONST.VALUABLE_FUSION_GAUGE))
4446  {
4447  newPoints = 0;
4448  }
4449 
4450  if(current != newPoints)
4451  {
4452  character->SetFusionGauge((uint32_t)newPoints);
4453 
4454  // If the visible percentage changed, send to the client
4455  if((current / 100) != (newPoints / 100))
4456  {
4457  SendFusionGauge(client);
4458  }
4459  }
4460 }
4461 
4462 void CharacterManager::SendFusionGauge(const std::shared_ptr<
4463  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client)
4464 {
4465  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4466  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4467 
4468  libcomp::Packet notify;
4469  notify.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_FUSION_GAUGE);
4470  notify.WriteS32Little((int32_t)cState->GetEntity()->GetFusionGauge());
4471  notify.WriteU8(cState->GetMaxFusionGaugeStocks());
4472 
4473  client->SendPacket(notify);
4474 }
4475 
4476 bool CharacterManager::UpdateCoinTotal(const std::shared_ptr<
4477  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int64_t amount, bool isAdjust)
4478 {
4479  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4480  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4481  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4482  if(!character)
4483  {
4484  return false;
4485  }
4486 
4487  auto progress = character->GetProgress().Get();
4488 
4489  int64_t oldAmount = progress->GetCoins();
4490  int64_t newAmount = isAdjust ? (oldAmount + amount) : amount;
4491  if(newAmount < 0)
4492  {
4493  // Not enough or set to below 0
4494  return false;
4495  }
4496 
4497  auto opChangeset = std::make_shared<libcomp::DBOperationalChangeSet>();
4498  auto expl = std::make_shared<libcomp::DBExplicitUpdate>(progress);
4499  expl->SetFrom<int64_t>("Coins", newAmount, oldAmount);
4500  opChangeset->AddOperation(expl);
4501 
4502  if(mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->ProcessChangeSet(opChangeset))
4503  {
4504  SendCoinTotal(client, true);
4505  return true;
4506  }
4507  else
4508  {
4509  return false;
4510  }
4511 }
4512 
4513 void CharacterManager::SendCoinTotal(const std::shared_ptr<
4514  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, bool isUpdate)
4515 {
4516  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4517  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4518  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4519  if(character)
4520  {
4521  auto progress = character->GetProgress().Get();
4522 
4523  libcomp::Packet reply;
4524  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_CASINO_COIN_TOTAL);
4525  reply.WriteS32Little(isUpdate ? -1 : 0); // Some internal indicator
4526  reply.WriteS64Little(progress->GetCoins());
4527 
4528  client->SendPacket(reply);
4529  }
4530 }
4531 
4532 bool CharacterManager::UpdateBP(const std::shared_ptr<
4533  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t points, bool isAdjust)
4534 {
4535  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4536  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4537  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4538  auto pvpData = character->GetPvPData().Get();
4539  if(!pvpData)
4540  {
4541  return false;
4542  }
4543 
4544  int32_t current = pvpData->GetBP();
4545  int32_t newPoints = isAdjust ? current + points : points;
4546 
4547  if(newPoints < 0)
4548  {
4549  newPoints = 0;
4550  }
4551 
4552  if(current != newPoints)
4553  {
4554  pvpData->SetBP(newPoints);
4555  if(newPoints > current)
4556  {
4557  pvpData->SetBPTotal(pvpData->GetBPTotal() +
4558  (newPoints - current));
4559  }
4560 
4561  libcomp::Packet p;
4562  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_BP_UPDATE);
4563  p.WriteS32Little(newPoints);
4564  p.WriteS32Little(pvpData->GetBPTotal());
4565 
4566  client->SendPacket(p);
4567 
4568  mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(pvpData,
4569  state->GetAccountUID());
4570  }
4571 
4572  return true;
4573 }
4574 
4575 void CharacterManager::SendPvPCharacterInfo(const std::shared_ptr<
4576  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client)
4577 {
4578  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4579  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4580  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4581  auto pvpData = character ? character->GetPvPData().Get() : nullptr;
4582 
4583  libcomp::Packet reply;
4584  reply.WritePacketCode(
4585  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_PVP_CHARACTER_INFO);
4586 
4587  if(pvpData)
4588  {
4589  reply.WriteS32Little(0);
4590  reply.WriteS32Little(pvpData->GetGP());
4591  reply.WriteS8(pvpData->GetRanked() ? 1 : 0);
4592  reply.WriteS8((int8_t)pvpData->GetPenaltyCount());
4593  reply.WriteS32Little(pvpData->GetBP());
4594 
4595  auto stats = pvpData->GetModeStats();
4596  for(size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++)
4597  {
4598  size_t offset = (size_t)(i * 3);
4599 
4600  reply.WriteS32Little(stats[offset]); // Wins
4601  reply.WriteS32Little(stats[(size_t)(offset + 1)]); // Losses
4602  reply.WriteS32Little(stats[(size_t)(offset + 2)]); // Draws
4603  }
4604 
4605  reply.WriteS32Little(pvpData->GetKillTotal());
4606  reply.WriteS32Little(pvpData->GetDeathTotal());
4607  reply.WriteS32Little(pvpData->GetBPTotal());
4608 
4609  auto trophies = pvpData->GetTrophies();
4610 
4611  int32_t trophyCount = 0;
4612  for(int32_t trophy : trophies)
4613  {
4614  if(trophy > 0)
4615  {
4616  trophyCount++;
4617  }
4618  }
4619 
4620  reply.WriteS32Little(trophyCount);
4621  for(size_t i = 0; i < trophies.size(); i++)
4622  {
4623  int32_t trophy = trophies[i];
4624  if(trophy > 0)
4625  {
4626  reply.WriteS8((int8_t)(i + 1));
4627  reply.WriteS32Little(trophy);
4628  }
4629  }
4630  }
4631  else
4632  {
4633  reply.WriteBlank(54);
4634  }
4635 
4636  client->SendPacket(reply);
4637 }
4638 
4639 int32_t CharacterManager::UpdateBethel(const std::shared_ptr<
4640  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t bethel, bool adjust)
4641 {
4642  auto server = mServer.lock();
4643  auto entry = server->GetMatchManager()->LoadPentalphaData(client, 0x01);
4644  if(entry && entry->GetActive())
4645  {
4646  int32_t val = bethel;
4647  if(adjust)
4648  {
4649  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4650  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4651  double rateAdjust = 1.0 + (server->GetTokuseiManager()
4652  ->GetAspectSum(cState, TokuseiAspectType::BETHEL_RATE) * 0.01);
4653 
4654  val = (int32_t)((double)val * rateAdjust);
4655  }
4656 
4657  std::array<int32_t, 5> allBethel = { { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 } };
4658  allBethel[(size_t)entry->GetTeam()] = val;
4659  if(UpdateCowrieBethel(client, 0, allBethel))
4660  {
4661  return val;
4662  }
4663  }
4664 
4665  return 0;
4666 }
4667 
4668 bool CharacterManager::UpdateCowrieBethel(const std::shared_ptr<
4669  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t cowrie,
4670  const std::array<int32_t, 5>& bethel)
4671 {
4672  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4673  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4674  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4675  auto progress = character ? character->GetProgress().Get() : nullptr;
4676  if(progress)
4677  {
4678  if(cowrie)
4679  {
4680  int32_t newCowrie = progress->GetCowrie() + cowrie;
4681  if(newCowrie < 0)
4682  {
4683  newCowrie = 0;
4684  }
4685 
4686  progress->SetCowrie(newCowrie);
4687  }
4688 
4689  bool bethelUpdated = false;
4690  auto newBethel = progress->GetBethel();
4691  for(size_t i = 0; i < 5; i++)
4692  {
4693  if(bethel[i])
4694  {
4695  newBethel[i] += bethel[i];
4696  if(newBethel[i] < 0)
4697  {
4698  newBethel[i] = 0;
4699  }
4700 
4701  bethelUpdated = true;
4702  }
4703  }
4704 
4705  if(bethelUpdated)
4706  {
4707  progress->SetBethel(newBethel);
4708  }
4709 
4710  if(cowrie || bethelUpdated)
4711  {
4712  SendCowrieBethel(client);
4713 
4714  mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(progress);
4715 
4716  return true;
4717  }
4718  }
4719 
4720  return false;
4721 }
4722 
4723 void CharacterManager::SendCowrieBethel(const std::shared_ptr<
4724  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client)
4725 {
4726  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4727  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4728  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4729  auto progress = character ? character->GetProgress().Get() : nullptr;
4730  if(progress)
4731  {
4732  libcomp::Packet reply;
4733  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_COWRIE_BETHEL);
4734  for(int32_t bethel : progress->GetBethel())
4735  {
4736  reply.WriteS32Little(bethel);
4737  }
4738  reply.WriteS32Little(progress->GetCowrie());
4739 
4740  client->SendPacket(reply);
4741  }
4742 }
4743 
4744 bool CharacterManager::UpdateEventCounter(const std::shared_ptr<
4745  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t type, int32_t value,
4746  bool noSync)
4747 {
4748  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4749 
4750  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(state->GetAccountUID());
4751 
4752  auto eCounter = state->GetEventCounters(type).Get();
4753  if(!eCounter)
4754  {
4755  // Create a new one
4756  auto characterUID = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntityUUID();
4757  if(characterUID == NULLUUID)
4758  {
4759  return false;
4760  }
4761 
4762  eCounter = libcomp::PersistentObject::New<objects::EventCounter>(true);
4763  eCounter->SetCharacter(characterUID);
4764  eCounter->SetType(type);
4765  eCounter->SetCounter(value);
4766  eCounter->SetTimestamp((uint32_t)std::time(0));
4767 
4768  state->SetEventCounters(type, eCounter);
4769 
4770  dbChanges->Insert(eCounter);
4771  }
4772  else
4773  {
4774  eCounter->SetCounter(eCounter->GetCounter() + value);
4775 
4776  dbChanges->Update(eCounter);
4777  }
4778 
4779  auto server = mServer.lock();
4780  if(!server->GetWorldDatabase()->ProcessChangeSet(dbChanges))
4781  {
4782  return false;
4783  }
4784 
4785  if(!noSync)
4786  {
4787  server->GetChannelSyncManager()->SyncRecordUpdate(eCounter,
4788  "EventCounter");
4789  }
4790 
4791  return true;
4792 }
4793 
4794 bool CharacterManager::UpdateExperience(const std::shared_ptr<
4795  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int64_t xp,
4796  int32_t entityID)
4797 {
4798  auto server = mServer.lock();
4799 
4800  auto state = client->GetClientState();
4801  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
4802  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
4803  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
4804  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
4805 
4806  auto eState = state->GetEntityState(entityID);
4807  auto stats = eState ? eState->GetCoreStats() : nullptr;
4808  if(!eState || !eState->Ready(true) || !stats)
4809  {
4810  return false;
4811  }
4812 
4813  const static int8_t levelCap = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
4814  ->GetLevelCap();
4815 
4816  int8_t level = stats->GetLevel();
4817  if(level >= levelCap)
4818  {
4819  return true;
4820  }
4821 
4822  auto demonData = eState->GetDevilData();
4823  if(eState == dState && (!dState->IsAlive() || !demonData))
4824  {
4825  // Demons cannot level when dead
4826  return false;
4827  }
4828 
4829  if(xp < 0 && (stats->GetXP() + xp) < 0)
4830  {
4831  // Attempted to remove more XP than the current level
4832  return false;
4833  }
4834 
4835  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(state
4836  ->GetAccountUID());
4837 
4838  int8_t startingLevel = level;
4839  int64_t xpDelta = stats->GetXP() + xp;
4840  int64_t xpCurrent = xpDelta;
4841  while(level < levelCap &&
4842  xpDelta >= (int64_t)libcomp::LEVEL_XP_REQUIREMENTS[level])
4843  {
4844  xpDelta = xpDelta - (int64_t)libcomp::LEVEL_XP_REQUIREMENTS[level++];
4845  }
4846 
4847  if(level == levelCap)
4848  {
4849  xpCurrent -= xpDelta;
4850  xpDelta = 0;
4851  }
4852 
4853  stats->SetXP(xpDelta);
4854  dbChanges->Update(stats);
4855 
4856  libcomp::Packet reply;
4857  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_XP_UPDATE);
4858  reply.WriteS32Little(entityID);
4859  reply.WriteS64(xpCurrent); // Can show above 100% until level up
4860  reply.WriteS64Little(xp);
4861 
4862  client->QueuePacket(reply);
4863 
4864  if(level > startingLevel)
4865  {
4866  // Level gained, update contextual to character or demon. Stat
4867  // recalcs always happen first
4868  stats->SetLevel(level);
4869 
4870  if(eState == dState)
4871  {
4872  CalculateDemonBaseStats(demon);
4873  }
4874  else
4875  {
4876  CalculateCharacterBaseStats(stats);
4877  }
4878 
4879  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(eState, true,
4880  std::set<int32_t>{ eState->GetEntityID() });
4881  RecalculateStats(eState, client, false);
4882  if(eState->IsAlive())
4883  {
4884  stats->SetHP(eState->GetMaxHP());
4885  stats->SetMP(eState->GetMaxMP());
4886  }
4887 
4888  if(eState == dState)
4889  {
4890  // Gather all skills so nothing is "re-acquired"
4891  std::set<uint32_t> demonSkills;
4892  for(uint32_t skillID : demon->GetLearnedSkills())
4893  {
4894  demonSkills.insert(skillID);
4895  }
4896 
4897  for(uint32_t skillID : demon->GetAcquiredSkills())
4898  {
4899  demonSkills.insert(skillID);
4900  }
4901 
4902  for(auto iSkill : demon->GetInheritedSkills())
4903  {
4904  demonSkills.insert(!iSkill.IsNull() ? iSkill->GetSkill() : 0);
4905  }
4906 
4907  demonSkills.erase(0);
4908 
4909  std::list<uint32_t> newSkills;
4910  auto growth = demonData->GetGrowth();
4911  for(auto acSkill : growth->GetAcquisitionSkills())
4912  {
4913  uint32_t skillID = acSkill->GetID();
4914  if(skillID && acSkill->GetLevel() <= (uint32_t)level &&
4915  acSkill->GetLevel() >= (uint32_t)startingLevel &&
4916  demonSkills.find(skillID) == demonSkills.end())
4917  {
4918  demon->AppendAcquiredSkills(skillID);
4919  newSkills.push_back(skillID);
4920  demonSkills.insert(skillID);
4921  }
4922  }
4923 
4924  libcomp::Packet notify;
4925  notify.WritePacketCode(
4926  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_PARTNER_LEVEL_UP);
4927  notify.WriteS32Little(entityID);
4928  notify.WriteS8(level);
4929  notify.WriteS64Little(xpDelta);
4930  GetEntityStatsPacketData(notify, stats, dState, 1);
4931 
4932  notify.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)newSkills.size());
4933  for(uint32_t skillID : newSkills)
4934  {
4935  notify.WriteU32Little(skillID);
4936  }
4937 
4938  // All players see the level up
4939  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, notify, true);
4940 
4941  // Familiarity is adjusted based on the demon's familiarity type
4942  // and level achieved
4943  auto fType = server->GetServerDataManager()
4944  ->GetDemonFamiliarityTypeData(demonData->GetFamiliarity()
4945  ->GetFamiliarityType());
4946 
4947  // Gain familiarity and expertise points per level
4948  int32_t familiarityGain = 0;
4949  int32_t ePoints = 0;
4950  for(int8_t lvl = startingLevel; lvl <= level; lvl++)
4951  {
4952  familiarityGain = familiarityGain +
4953  (int32_t)(lvl * (fType ? fType->GetLevelUp() : 0));
4954 
4955  // Psychology raises by different amounts based on character
4956  // and demon level difference
4957  int8_t delta = (int8_t)((cState->GetLevel() - lvl) / 10);
4958  if(delta < 0)
4959  {
4960  delta = 0;
4961  }
4962 
4963  // Calculation based on difference uses two formulas based
4964  // on data gathered from JP
4965  if(delta < 5)
4966  {
4967  ePoints = ePoints + (int32_t)(10000 - (delta * 2000));
4968  }
4969  else
4970  {
4971  ePoints = ePoints + (int32_t)(floor(10.f -
4972  ((float)delta - 5.f) * 2.1f) * 100.f);
4973  }
4974  }
4975 
4976  if(familiarityGain > 0)
4977  {
4978  UpdateFamiliarity(client, familiarityGain, true);
4979  }
4980 
4981  // Update psychology expertise
4982  if(ePoints > 0)
4983  {
4984  double rate = (double)cState->GetCorrectValue(
4985  CorrectTbl::RATE_EXPERTISE) * 0.01;
4986 
4987  std::list<std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>> expPoints;
4988  expPoints.push_back(std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>(
4989  EXPERTISE_PSYCHOLOGY, (int32_t)((double)ePoints * rate)));
4990 
4991  UpdateExpertisePoints(client, expPoints);
4992  }
4993 
4994  dbChanges->Update(demon);
4995 
4996  LogCharacterManagerDebug([demon, startingLevel, level]()
4997  {
4998  return libcomp::String("Demon has leveled up from"
4999  " %1 to %2!\n").Arg(demon->GetUUID().ToString())
5000  .Arg(startingLevel).Arg(level);
5001  });
5002  }
5003  else
5004  {
5005  // Gain skill points per level and randomly gain bonuses at a
5006  // rate of 2 per level (can be repeated up to a configurable
5007  // amount of times)
5008  const static float bonusChance = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
5009  ->GetLevelUpBonusChance();
5010  const static uint8_t bonusMax = server->GetWorldSharedConfig()
5011  ->GetLevelUpBonusMax();
5012 
5013  int32_t points = 0;
5014  int32_t bonusCount = 0;
5015  for(int8_t lvl = startingLevel; lvl < level; lvl++)
5016  {
5017  points = points + (int32_t)(floorl((float)lvl / 5) + 2);
5018 
5019  if(bonusChance > 0.f)
5020  {
5021  for(uint8_t i = 0; i < bonusMax; i++)
5022  {
5023  if(bonusChance >= 100.f ||
5024  RNG_DEC(float, 0.01f, 100.f, 2) <= bonusChance)
5025  {
5026  points = points + 2;
5027  bonusCount++;
5028  }
5029  }
5030  }
5031  }
5032 
5033  character->SetPoints(character->GetPoints() + points);
5034 
5035  libcomp::Packet notify;
5036  notify.WritePacketCode(
5037  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_CHARACTER_LEVEL_UP);
5038  notify.WriteS32Little(entityID);
5039  notify.WriteS32(bonusCount);
5040  notify.WriteS8(level);
5041  notify.WriteS64(xpDelta);
5042  notify.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cState->GetMaxHP());
5043  notify.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cState->GetMaxMP());
5044  notify.WriteS32Little(points);
5045 
5046  // All players see the level up
5047  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, notify, true);
5048 
5049  if(demon)
5050  {
5051  // Send congrats message from demon
5052  notify.Clear();
5053  notify.WritePacketCode(
5054  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_LEVEL_UP_CONGRATS);
5055  notify.WriteS64Little(state->GetObjectID(demon->GetUUID()));
5056 
5057  client->QueuePacket(notify);
5058  }
5059 
5060  // Add levelup status effects
5061  StatusEffectChanges effects;
5062  for(auto& pair : SVR_CONST.LEVELUP_STATUSES)
5063  {
5064  effects[pair.first] = StatusEffectChange(pair.first,
5065  (int8_t)pair.second, true);
5066  }
5067 
5068  if(effects.size() > 0)
5069  {
5070  cState->AddStatusEffects(effects,
5071  server->GetDefinitionManager());
5072  }
5073 
5074  dbChanges->Update(character);
5075 
5076  LogCharacterManagerDebug([cState, startingLevel, level]()
5077  {
5078  return libcomp::String("Character %1 has leveled up from"
5079  " %2 to %3!\n").Arg(cState->GetEntityUUID().ToString())
5080  .Arg(startingLevel).Arg(level);
5081  });
5082  }
5083  }
5084 
5085  client->FlushOutgoing();
5086 
5087  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
5088 
5089  return true;
5090 }
5091 
5092 void CharacterManager::LevelUp(const std::shared_ptr<
5093  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int8_t level, int32_t entityID)
5094 {
5095  if(level < 2 || level > 99)
5096  {
5097  return;
5098  }
5099 
5100  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5101  auto eState = state->GetEntityState(entityID);
5102  auto stats = eState ? eState->GetCoreStats() : 0;
5103  if(!eState || !stats)
5104  {
5105  return;
5106  }
5107 
5108  int64_t xpGain = 0;
5109  for(int8_t i = stats->GetLevel(); i < level; i++)
5110  {
5111  if(xpGain == 0)
5112  {
5113  xpGain += (int64_t)libcomp::LEVEL_XP_REQUIREMENTS[i] -
5114  stats->GetXP();
5115  }
5116  else
5117  {
5118  xpGain += (int64_t)libcomp::LEVEL_XP_REQUIREMENTS[i];
5119  }
5120  }
5121 
5122  UpdateExperience(client, xpGain, entityID);
5123 }
5124 
5125 void CharacterManager::UpdateExpertise(const std::shared_ptr<
5126  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, uint32_t skillID,
5127  uint16_t rateBoost, float multiplier)
5128 {
5129  auto server = mServer.lock();
5130  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5131 
5132  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5133  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5134  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5135 
5136  auto skill = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
5137  if(nullptr == skill)
5138  {
5139  LogCharacterManagerWarning([&]()
5140  {
5141  return libcomp::String("Unknown skill ID encountered in"
5142  " UpdateExpertise: %1").Arg(skillID);
5143  });
5144 
5145  return;
5146  }
5147  else if(skill->GetCommon()->GetCategory()->GetMainCategory() ==
5148  SKILL_CATEGORY_SWITCH)
5149  {
5150  // Switch skills should never grant expertise
5151  return;
5152  }
5153 
5154  std::list<std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>> pointMap;
5155  for(auto expertGrowth : skill->GetExpertGrowth())
5156  {
5157  int32_t points = CalculateExpertiseGain(cState, expertGrowth
5158  ->GetExpertiseID(), (float)expertGrowth->GetGrowthRate(),
5159  rateBoost, multiplier);
5160  if(points)
5161  {
5162  pointMap.push_back(std::make_pair(expertGrowth
5163  ->GetExpertiseID(), points));
5164  }
5165  }
5166 
5167  if(pointMap.size() > 0)
5168  {
5169  UpdateExpertisePoints(client, pointMap);
5170  }
5171 }
5172 
5173 int32_t CharacterManager::CalculateExpertiseGain(const std::shared_ptr<
5174  CharacterState>& cState, uint8_t expertiseID, float growthRate,
5175  uint16_t rateBoost, float multiplier)
5176 {
5177  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5178  auto expertise = character->GetExpertises(expertiseID).Get();
5179 
5180  // If it hasn't been created, it is disabled
5181  if(expertise && !expertise->GetDisabled())
5182  {
5183  if(multiplier <= 0.f)
5184  {
5185  // Value not overridden, use 100% + adjustments
5186  multiplier = (float)cState->GetCorrectValue(
5187  CorrectTbl::RATE_EXPERTISE) * 0.01f;
5188  }
5189 
5190  auto expDef = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager()
5191  ->GetExpertClassData(expertiseID);
5192  if(expDef)
5193  {
5194  // Calculate the point gain
5195  float cls = (float)(expertise->GetPoints() / 100000);
5196  float rnk = (float)((expertise->GetPoints() % 100000) / 10000);
5197 
5198  int32_t gain = (int32_t)floor(((growthRate + (float)rateBoost) *
5199  multiplier * 500.f) / (cls + 1.f) / (rnk + 1.f));
5200  if(gain > 0)
5201  {
5202  return gain;
5203  }
5204  }
5205  }
5206 
5207  return 0;
5208 }
5209 
5210 void CharacterManager::UpdateExpertisePoints(const std::shared_ptr<
5211  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
5212  const std::list<std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>>& pointMap, bool force)
5213 {
5214  auto server = mServer.lock();
5215  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5216 
5217  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5218  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5219  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5220 
5221  int32_t maxTotalPoints = GetMaxExpertisePoints(character);
5222 
5223  int32_t currentPoints = 0;
5224  for(auto expertise : character->GetExpertises())
5225  {
5226  if(!expertise.IsNull())
5227  {
5228  currentPoints = currentPoints + expertise->GetPoints();
5229  }
5230  }
5231 
5232  bool rankChanged = false;
5233 
5234  std::list<std::pair<uint8_t, int32_t>> raised;
5235  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(
5236  state->GetAccountUID());
5237  for(auto pointPair : pointMap)
5238  {
5239  auto expDef = definitionManager->GetExpertClassData(pointPair.first);
5240 
5241  if(!expDef) continue;
5242 
5243  auto expertise = character->GetExpertises(pointPair.first).Get();
5244  if(!expertise)
5245  {
5246  if(force)
5247  {
5248  // Create it
5249  expertise = libcomp::PersistentObject::New<objects::Expertise>(
5250  true);
5251  expertise->SetExpertiseID(pointPair.first);
5252  expertise->SetCharacter(character->GetUUID());
5253  expertise->SetDisabled(true);
5254 
5255  character->SetExpertises((size_t)pointPair.first, expertise);
5256 
5257  dbChanges->Update(character);
5258  dbChanges->Insert(expertise);
5259 
5260  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
5261  }
5262  else
5263  {
5264  continue;
5265  }
5266  }
5267  else if(expertise->GetDisabled() && !force)
5268  {
5269  continue;
5270  }
5271 
5272  int32_t maxPoints = (expDef->GetMaxClass() * 100 * 1000)
5273  + (expDef->GetMaxRank() * 100 * 100);
5274 
5275  int32_t expPoints = expertise->GetPoints();
5276  int8_t currentRank = (int8_t)floorl((float)expPoints * 0.0001f);
5277 
5278  int32_t adjust = pointPair.second;
5279  if(adjust > 0)
5280  {
5281  if(expPoints == maxPoints) continue;
5282 
5283  // Don't exceed the max total points
5284  if((currentPoints + adjust) > maxTotalPoints)
5285  {
5286  adjust = maxTotalPoints - currentPoints;
5287  }
5288 
5289  // Don't exceed max expertise points
5290  if((expPoints + adjust) > maxPoints)
5291  {
5292  adjust = maxPoints - expPoints;
5293  }
5294  }
5295  else if(adjust < 0)
5296  {
5297  // Do not decrease below 0
5298  if((expPoints - adjust) < 0)
5299  {
5300  adjust = expPoints;
5301  }
5302  }
5303 
5304  if(adjust == 0) continue;
5305 
5306  currentPoints = currentPoints + adjust;
5307  expPoints += adjust;
5308 
5309  expertise->SetPoints(expPoints);
5310 
5311  int8_t newRank = (int8_t)((float)expPoints * 0.0001f);
5312 
5313  rankChanged |= currentRank != newRank;
5314  if(adjust > 0)
5315  {
5316  // Points up
5317  raised.push_back(std::make_pair(pointPair.first, expPoints));
5318 
5319  if(currentRank != newRank)
5320  {
5321  libcomp::Packet reply;
5322  reply.WritePacketCode(
5323  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_EXPERTISE_RANK_UP);
5324  reply.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
5325  reply.WriteS8((int8_t)expDef->GetID());
5326  reply.WriteS8(newRank);
5327 
5328  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, reply);
5329  }
5330  }
5331  else
5332  {
5333  // Points down
5334  libcomp::Packet notify;
5335  notify.WritePacketCode(
5336  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_EXPERTISE_DOWN);
5337  notify.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
5338  notify.WriteS8(1); // Success
5339  notify.WriteS8((int8_t)expDef->GetID());
5340  notify.WriteS32Little(expPoints);
5341 
5342  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, notify);
5343  }
5344 
5345  dbChanges->Update(expertise);
5346  }
5347 
5348  if(raised.size() > 0)
5349  {
5350  libcomp::Packet reply;
5351  reply.WritePacketCode(
5352  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_EXPERTISE_POINT_UPDATE);
5353  reply.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
5354  reply.WriteS32Little((int32_t)raised.size());
5355  for(auto update : raised)
5356  {
5357  reply.WriteS8((int8_t)update.first);
5358  reply.WriteS32Little(update.second);
5359  }
5360 
5361  client->SendPacket(reply);
5362  }
5363 
5364  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
5365 
5366  if(rankChanged)
5367  {
5368  //Expertises can be used as multipliers and conditions, always recalc
5369  cState->RecalcDisabledSkills(definitionManager);
5370  state->GetDemonState()->UpdateDemonState(definitionManager);
5371  RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(cState, client);
5372  }
5373 }
5374 
5375 int32_t CharacterManager::GetMaxExpertisePoints(const std::shared_ptr<
5376  objects::Character>& character)
5377 {
5378  auto stats = character->GetCoreStats();
5379 
5380  int32_t maxPoints = MIN_EXPERTISE_POINTS +
5381  (int32_t)(floorl((float)stats->GetLevel() * 0.1) * 1000 * 100) +
5382  ((int32_t)character->GetExpertiseExtension() * 1000 * 100);
5383 
5384  if(stats->GetLevel() == 99)
5385  {
5386  // Level 99 awards a bonus 1000.00 points available
5387  maxPoints = maxPoints + 100000;
5388  }
5389 
5390  return maxPoints;
5391 }
5392 
5393 void CharacterManager::SendExpertiseExtension(const std::shared_ptr<
5394  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5395 {
5396  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5397  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5398  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5399 
5400  if(character)
5401  {
5402  libcomp::Packet p;
5403  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_EXPERTISE_EXTENSION);
5404  p.WriteS8(character->GetExpertiseExtension());
5405 
5406  client->SendPacket(p);
5407  }
5408 }
5409 
5410 void CharacterManager::UpdateSkillPoints(const std::shared_ptr<
5411  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t points)
5412 {
5413  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5414  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5415  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5416 
5417  if(character)
5418  {
5419  character->SetPoints(character->GetPoints() + points);
5420 
5421  libcomp::Packet p;
5422  p.WritePacketCode(
5423  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_SKILL_POINT_UPDATE);
5424  p.WriteS32Little(character->GetPoints());
5425 
5426  client->SendPacket(p);
5427 
5428  mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(character,
5429  state->GetAccountUID());
5430  }
5431 }
5432 
5433 bool CharacterManager::LearnSkill(const std::shared_ptr<
5434  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, int32_t entityID,
5435  uint32_t skillID)
5436 {
5437  auto server = mServer.lock();
5438  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5439  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5440  auto eState = state->GetEntityState(entityID);
5441 
5442  auto def = definitionManager->GetSkillData(skillID);
5443  if(nullptr == eState || nullptr == def)
5444  {
5445  return false;
5446  }
5447 
5448  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
5449  if(eState == dState)
5450  {
5451  if(def->GetCommon()->GetCategory()->GetMainCategory() ==
5452  SKILL_CATEGORY_SWITCH)
5453  {
5454  // Switch skills are not supported on partner demons
5455  return false;
5456  }
5457 
5458  // Check if the skill is available anywhere for the demon
5459  auto demon = dState->GetEntity();
5460  auto learnedSkills = demon->GetLearnedSkills();
5461  auto inheritedSkills = demon->GetInheritedSkills();
5462 
5463  std::list<uint32_t> skills = demon->GetAcquiredSkills();
5464  for(auto s : learnedSkills)
5465  {
5466  skills.push_back(s);
5467  }
5468 
5469  for(auto s : inheritedSkills)
5470  {
5471  if(!s.IsNull())
5472  {
5473  skills.push_back(s->GetSkill());
5474  }
5475  }
5476 
5477  if(std::find(skills.begin(), skills.end(), skillID) != skills.end())
5478  {
5479  // Skill already exists
5480  return true;
5481  }
5482 
5483  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(state->GetAccountUID());
5484 
5485  // Demon skills are learned as 100% progress inherited skills
5486  auto iSkill = libcomp::PersistentObject::New<
5487  objects::InheritedSkill>(true);
5488  iSkill->SetSkill(skillID);
5489  iSkill->SetProgress(MAX_INHERIT_SKILL);
5490  iSkill->SetDemon(demon->GetUUID());
5491 
5492  demon->AppendInheritedSkills(iSkill);
5493 
5494  dbChanges->Insert(iSkill);
5495  dbChanges->Update(demon);
5496 
5497  libcomp::Packet p;
5498  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_INHERIT_SKILL_UPDATED);
5499  p.WriteS32Little(eState->GetEntityID());
5500  p.WriteS32Little(1);
5501  p.WriteU32Little(skillID);
5502  p.WriteS32Little(MAX_INHERIT_SKILL);
5503 
5504  client->SendPacket(p);
5505 
5506  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
5507  }
5508  else
5509  {
5510  // Check if the skill has already been learned
5511  auto character = state->GetCharacterState()->GetEntity();
5512  if(character->LearnedSkillsContains(skillID))
5513  {
5514  // Skill already exists
5515  return true;
5516  }
5517 
5518  character->InsertLearnedSkills(skillID);
5519 
5520  libcomp::Packet reply;
5521  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_LEARN_SKILL);
5522  reply.WriteS32Little(entityID);
5523  reply.WriteU32Little(skillID);
5524 
5525  client->SendPacket(reply);
5526 
5527  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(character, state->GetAccountUID());
5528 
5529  if(skillID == SVR_CONST.MITAMA_SET_BOOST)
5530  {
5531  dState->UpdateDemonState(definitionManager);
5532  }
5533 
5534  RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(eState, client);
5535  }
5536 
5537  return true;
5538 }
5539 
5540 bool CharacterManager::GetSynthOutcome(ClientState* synthState,
5541  const std::shared_ptr<objects::PlayerExchangeSession>& exchangeSession,
5542  uint32_t& outcomeItemType, std::list<int32_t>& successRates,
5543  int16_t* effectID, uint32_t* enchantSpecialID)
5544 {
5545  successRates.clear();
5546  outcomeItemType = static_cast<uint32_t>(-1);
5547 
5548  if(!synthState || !exchangeSession)
5549  {
5550  return false;
5551  }
5552 
5553  auto server = mServer.lock();
5554  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5555  auto cState = synthState->GetCharacterState();
5556  auto dState = synthState->GetDemonState();
5557 
5558  bool isSoul = exchangeSession->GetType() ==
5559  objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::ENCHANT_SOUL;
5560  bool isTarot = exchangeSession->GetType() ==
5561  objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::ENCHANT_TAROT;
5562 
5563  std::list<double> rates;
5564  if(isSoul || isTarot)
5565  {
5566  auto inputItem = exchangeSession->GetItems(0).Get();
5567  auto crystal = exchangeSession->GetItems(1).Get();
5568  auto boostItem = exchangeSession->GetItems(2).Get();
5569 
5570  if(crystal && inputItem)
5571  {
5572  auto enchantData = definitionManager->GetEnchantDataByItemID(
5573  crystal->GetType());
5574  auto itemData = definitionManager->GetItemData(inputItem->GetType());
5575  if(!enchantData || !itemData || !effectID ||
5576  inputItem->GetDurability() == 0)
5577  {
5578  return false;
5579  }
5580  else if(isTarot &&
5581  (itemData->GetBasic()->GetFlags() & ITEM_FLAG_TAROT) == 0 &&
5582  inputItem->GetTarot() != ENCHANT_ENABLE_EFFECT)
5583  {
5584  auto accountUID = synthState->GetAccountUID();
5585  LogItemError([inputItem, accountUID]()
5586  {
5587  return libcomp::String("Player attempted to tarot fuse"
5588  " disabled item %1 (type %2): %3\n")
5589  .Arg(inputItem->GetUUID().ToString())
5590  .Arg(inputItem->GetType())
5591  .Arg(accountUID.ToString());
5592  });
5593 
5594  return false;
5595  }
5596  else if(isSoul &&
5597  (itemData->GetBasic()->GetFlags() & ITEM_FLAG_SOUL) == 0 &&
5598  inputItem->GetSoul() != ENCHANT_ENABLE_EFFECT)
5599  {
5600  auto accountUID = synthState->GetAccountUID();
5601  LogItemError([inputItem, accountUID]()
5602  {
5603  return libcomp::String("Player attempted to soul fuse"
5604  " disabled item %1 (type %2): %3\n")
5605  .Arg(inputItem->GetUUID().ToString())
5606  .Arg(inputItem->GetType())
5607  .Arg(accountUID.ToString());
5608  });
5609 
5610  return false;
5611  }
5612 
5613  if(effectID)
5614  {
5615  *effectID = enchantData->GetID();
5616  }
5617 
5618  double expRank = (double)cState->GetExpertiseRank(
5619  EXPERTISE_CHAIN_SYNTHESIS, definitionManager);
5620 
5621  double boostRate = 0.0;
5622  if(boostItem)
5623  {
5624  auto it = SVR_CONST.ADJUSTMENT_ITEMS.find(boostItem->GetType());
5625  if(it != SVR_CONST.ADJUSTMENT_ITEMS.end() && it->second[0] == 1)
5626  {
5627  boostRate = (double)it->second[1];
5628  }
5629  }
5630 
5631  // If the input is a CP item, the rate increases
5632  double cpBoost = IsCPItem(itemData) ? 20.0 : 0.0;
5633 
5634  double demonBoost = 0.0;
5635  if(dState->Ready())
5636  {
5637  int16_t intel = dState->GetINTEL();
5638  int16_t luck = dState->GetLUCK();
5639  for(auto pair : SVR_CONST.ADJUSTMENT_SKILLS)
5640  {
5641  // Skill adjustments
5642  if(pair.second[0] == 1 && dState->CurrentSkillsContains(
5643  (uint32_t)pair.first))
5644  {
5645  demonBoost = demonBoost +
5646  (double)(intel + luck) / (double)pair.second[1];
5647  }
5648  }
5649  }
5650 
5651  double rate = 0.0;
5652  uint16_t validEquipTypes = 0;
5653  if(isTarot)
5654  {
5655  auto tarotData = enchantData->GetDevilCrystal()->GetTarot();
5656  double diff = (double)tarotData->GetDifficulty();
5657 
5658  rate = floor((double)cState->GetINTEL() / 5.0 +
5659  (double)cState->GetLUCK() / 10.0 + expRank / 2.0 + (30.0 - diff) +
5660  cpBoost + demonBoost + boostRate);
5661  validEquipTypes = tarotData->GetEquipTypes();
5662  }
5663  else
5664  {
5665  auto soulData = enchantData->GetDevilCrystal()->GetSoul();
5666  double diff = (double)soulData->GetDifficulty();
5667 
5668  rate = floor((double)cState->GetINTEL() / 10.0 +
5669  (double)cState->GetLUCK() / 5.0 + expRank + (20.0 - diff) +
5670  cpBoost + demonBoost + boostRate);
5671  validEquipTypes = soulData->GetEquipTypes();
5672  }
5673 
5674  // Check if the equip types contain the input item's type
5675  int8_t equipType = (int8_t)itemData->GetBasic()->GetEquipType();
5676  if(equipType >= 0 &&
5677  (validEquipTypes & (1 << (uint16_t)equipType)) == 0)
5678  {
5679  // Reset values and quit
5680  *effectID = 0;
5681  return false;
5682  }
5683 
5684  rates.push_back(rate);
