5685  rate = 0.0;
5686 
5687  // Determine special enchant result
5688  auto specialEnchants = definitionManager->GetEnchantSpecialDataByInputItem(
5689  inputItem->GetType());
5690  for(auto specialEnchant : specialEnchants)
5691  {
5692  double diff = (double)specialEnchant->GetDifficulty();
5693 
5694  bool match = false;
5695  if(isTarot)
5696  {
5697  if(inputItem->GetSoul() == specialEnchant->GetSoul() &&
5698  *effectID == specialEnchant->GetTarot())
5699  {
5700  rate = floor((double)cState->GetINTEL() / 5.0 +
5701  (double)cState->GetLUCK() / 10.0 + expRank / 2.0 +
5702  (30.0 - diff) + cpBoost + demonBoost + boostRate);
5703 
5704  match = true;
5705  }
5706  }
5707  else
5708  {
5709  if(inputItem->GetTarot() == specialEnchant->GetTarot() &&
5710  *effectID == specialEnchant->GetSoul())
5711  {
5712  rate = floor((double)cState->GetINTEL() / 10.0 +
5713  (double)cState->GetLUCK() / 5.0 + expRank + (20 - diff) +
5714  cpBoost + demonBoost + boostRate);
5715 
5716  match = true;
5717  }
5718  }
5719 
5720  if(match)
5721  {
5722  outcomeItemType = specialEnchant->GetResultItem();
5723  rates.push_back(rate);
5724 
5725  if(enchantSpecialID)
5726  {
5727  *enchantSpecialID = specialEnchant->GetID();
5728  }
5729 
5730  // There should never be multiple but break just in case
5731  break;
5732  }
5733  }
5734  }
5735  }
5736  else if(exchangeSession->GetType() ==
5737  objects::PlayerExchangeSession::Type_t::CRYSTALLIZE)
5738  {
5739  auto inputItem = exchangeSession->GetItems(0).Get();
5740 
5741  auto targetCState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(
5742  exchangeSession->GetOtherCharacterState());
5743  auto targetDemon = targetCState
5744  ? targetCState->GetEntity()->GetActiveDemon().Get() : nullptr;
5745  if(targetDemon && inputItem)
5746  {
5747  auto demonData = definitionManager->GetDevilData(targetDemon->GetType());
5748  auto enchantData = demonData? definitionManager->GetEnchantDataByDemonID(
5749  demonData->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID()) : nullptr;
5750  if(!enchantData || !demonData)
5751  {
5752  return false;
5753  }
5754 
5755  double boostRate = 0.0;
5756 
5757  auto it = SVR_CONST.ADJUSTMENT_ITEMS.find(inputItem->GetType());
5758  if(it != SVR_CONST.ADJUSTMENT_ITEMS.end() && it->second[0] == 3)
5759  {
5760  // Adjustment item useable by any race
5761  boostRate = (double)it->second[1];
5762  }
5763  else
5764  {
5765  // Make sure the crystal being used is valid
5766  uint8_t raceID = (uint8_t)demonData->GetCategory()->GetRace();
5767 
5768  auto it2 = SVR_CONST.DEMON_CRYSTALS.find(inputItem->GetType());
5769  if(it2 == SVR_CONST.DEMON_CRYSTALS.end() ||
5770  it2->second.find(raceID) == it2->second.end())
5771  {
5772  return false;
5773  }
5774  }
5775 
5776  outcomeItemType = enchantData->GetDevilCrystal()->GetItemID();
5777 
5778  double diff = (double)enchantData->GetDevilCrystal()->GetDifficulty();
5779 
5780  double expRank = (double)cState->GetExpertiseRank(
5781  EXPERTISE_CHAIN_SYNTHESIS, definitionManager);
5782 
5783  double fam = (double)targetDemon->GetFamiliarity();
5784 
5785  rates.push_back(floor((double)cState->GetINTEL() / 10.0 +
5786  (double)cState->GetLUCK() / 10.0 + expRank / 2.0 + (100.0 - diff) +
5787  (fam - 10000.0) / 100.0) + boostRate);
5788  }
5789  }
5790  else
5791  {
5792  return false;
5793  }
5794 
5795  auto clock = server->GetWorldClockTime();
5796 
5797  for(double& rate : rates)
5798  {
5799  if(clock.MoonPhase == 8)
5800  {
5801  // Full moon boosts success rates
5802  rate = floor(rate * 1.2);
5803  }
5804 
5805  if(rate < 0.0)
5806  {
5807  rate = 0.0;
5808  }
5809  else if(rate > 100.0)
5810  {
5811  rate = 100.0;
5812  }
5813 
5814  // Tarot/soul have a 5% minimum no matter what
5815  if(rate < 5.0 && (isTarot || isSoul))
5816  {
5817  rate = 5.0;
5818  }
5819 
5820  successRates.push_back((int32_t)rate);
5821  }
5822 
5823  return true;
5824 }
5825 
5826 void CharacterManager::ConvertIDToMaskValues(uint16_t id, size_t& index,
5827  uint8_t& shiftVal)
5828 {
5829  index = (size_t)floor(id / 8);
5830  shiftVal = (uint8_t)(1 << (id % 8));
5831 }
5832 
5833 bool CharacterManager::AddMap(const std::shared_ptr<
5834  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, uint16_t mapID)
5835 {
5836  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5837  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5838  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5839  auto progress = character->GetProgress().Get();
5840 
5841  size_t index;
5842  uint8_t shiftVal;
5843  ConvertIDToMaskValues(mapID, index, shiftVal);
5844 
5845  if(index >= progress->GetMaps().size())
5846  {
5847  return false;
5848  }
5849 
5850  auto oldValue = progress->GetMaps(index);
5851  uint8_t newValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(oldValue | shiftVal);
5852 
5853  if(oldValue != newValue)
5854  {
5855  progress->SetMaps((size_t)index, newValue);
5856 
5857  SendMapFlags(client);
5858 
5859  mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(progress, state->GetAccountUID());
5860  }
5861 
5862  return true;
5863 }
5864 
5865 void CharacterManager::SendMapFlags(const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5866 {
5867  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5868  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5869  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5870  auto maps = character->GetProgress()->GetMaps();
5871 
5872  libcomp::Packet reply;
5873  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_MAP_FLAG);
5874  reply.WriteU16Little((uint16_t)maps.size());
5875  reply.WriteArray(&maps, (uint32_t)maps.size());
5876 
5877  client->SendPacket(reply);
5878 }
5879 
5880 bool CharacterManager::AddRemoveValuable(const std::shared_ptr<
5881  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, uint16_t valuableID, bool remove)
5882 {
5883  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5884  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5885  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5886  auto progress = character->GetProgress().Get();
5887 
5888  size_t index;
5889  uint8_t shiftVal;
5890  ConvertIDToMaskValues(valuableID, index, shiftVal);
5891 
5892  if(index >= progress->GetValuables().size())
5893  {
5894  return false;
5895  }
5896 
5897  auto oldValue = progress->GetValuables(index);
5898  uint8_t newValue = remove
5899  ? ((oldValue & shiftVal) ? (uint8_t)(oldValue ^ shiftVal) : oldValue)
5900  : (uint8_t)(oldValue | shiftVal);
5901 
5902  if(oldValue != newValue)
5903  {
5904  progress->SetValuables((size_t)index, newValue);
5905 
5906  SendValuableFlags(client);
5907 
5908  auto server = mServer.lock();
5909  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(progress, state->GetAccountUID());
5910 
5911  if(valuableID == SVR_CONST.VALUABLE_DEVIL_BOOK_V1 ||
5912  valuableID == SVR_CONST.VALUABLE_DEVIL_BOOK_V2)
5913  {
5914  // Enable/disable compendium boosts
5915  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
5916  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5917  if(dState->UpdateSharedState(character, definitionManager))
5918  {
5919  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true);
5920  }
5921  }
5922  else if(!remove &&
5923  (valuableID == SVR_CONST.VALUABLE_DIGITALIZE_LV1 ||
5924  valuableID == SVR_CONST.VALUABLE_DIGITALIZE_LV2))
5925  {
5926  // Learn digitalize skills and set default levels
5927  // (do not reset if removed)
5928  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
5929 
5930  for(uint16_t fid : { SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIGITALIZE,
5931  SVR_CONST.SKILL_DIGITALIZE_CANCEL})
5932  {
5933  for(uint32_t skillID : definitionManager->GetFunctionIDSkills(
5934  fid))
5935  {
5936  LearnSkill(client, cState->GetEntityID(), skillID);
5937  }
5938  }
5939 
5940  std::unordered_map<uint8_t, int32_t> lvlUp;
5941  for(uint8_t raceID : definitionManager->GetGuardianRaceIDs())
5942  {
5943  // No unlock information exists for auto-enabled races
5944  auto unlock = definitionManager->GetGuardianUnlockData(raceID);
5945  if(!unlock && progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(raceID) == 0)
5946  {
5947  // Initialize only
5948  lvlUp[raceID] = 0;
5949  }
5950  }
5951 
5952  if(lvlUp.size() > 0)
5953  {
5954  UpdateDigitalizePoints(client, lvlUp, false);
5955  }
5956  }
5957  }
5958 
5959  return true;
5960 }
5961 
5962 bool CharacterManager::HasValuable(const std::shared_ptr<objects::Character>& character,
5963  uint16_t valuableID)
5964 {
5965  auto progress = character ? character->GetProgress().Get() : nullptr;
5966 
5967  size_t index;
5968  uint8_t shiftVal;
5969  ConvertIDToMaskValues(valuableID, index, shiftVal);
5970 
5971  uint8_t indexVal = progress ? progress->GetValuables(index) : 0;
5972 
5973  return (indexVal & shiftVal) != 0;
5974 }
5975 
5976 void CharacterManager::SendValuableFlags(const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client)
5977 {
5978  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5979  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5980  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5981  auto valuables = character->GetProgress()->GetValuables();
5982 
5983  libcomp::Packet reply;
5984  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_VALUABLE_LIST);
5985  reply.WriteU16Little((uint16_t)valuables.size());
5986  reply.WriteArray(&valuables, (uint32_t)valuables.size());
5987 
5988  client->SendPacket(reply);
5989 }
5990 
5991 bool CharacterManager::AddPlugin(const std::shared_ptr<
5992  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client, uint16_t pluginID)
5993 {
5994  auto state = client->GetClientState();
5995  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
5996  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
5997  auto progress = character->GetProgress().Get();
5998 
5999  size_t index;
6000  uint8_t shiftVal;
6001  ConvertIDToMaskValues(pluginID, index, shiftVal);
6002 
6003  if(index >= progress->GetPlugins().size())
6004  {
6005  return false;
6006  }
6007 
6008  auto oldValue = progress->GetPlugins(index);
6009  uint8_t newValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(oldValue | shiftVal);
6010 
6011  if(oldValue != newValue)
6012  {
6013  progress->SetPlugins((size_t)index, newValue);
6014 
6015  SendPluginFlags(client);
6016 
6017  mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(progress, state->GetAccountUID());
6018  }
6019 
6020  return true;
6021 }
6022 
6023 void CharacterManager::SendPluginFlags(const std::shared_ptr<
6024  ChannelClientConnection>& client)
6025 {
6026  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6027  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6028  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
6029  auto plugins = character->GetProgress()->GetPlugins();
6030 
6031  libcomp::Packet reply;
6032  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_UNION_FLAG);
6033  reply.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
6034  reply.WriteU16Little((uint16_t)plugins.size());
6035  reply.WriteArray(&plugins, (uint32_t)plugins.size());
6036 
6037  client->SendPacket(reply);
6038 }
6039 
6040 bool CharacterManager::AddTitle(const std::shared_ptr<
6041  ChannelClientConnection>& client, int16_t titleID)
6042 {
6043  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6044  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6045  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
6046  auto progress = character->GetProgress().Get();
6047 
6048  bool updated = false;
6049  if(titleID < MAX_SPECIAL_TITLE)
6050  {
6051  // Special title
6052 
6053  size_t index;
6054  uint8_t shiftVal;
6055  ConvertIDToMaskValues((uint16_t)titleID, index, shiftVal);
6056 
6057  auto oldValue = progress->GetSpecialTitles(index);
6058  uint8_t newValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(oldValue | shiftVal);
6059 
6060  if(oldValue != newValue)
6061  {
6062  progress->SetSpecialTitles(index,
6063  (uint8_t)(shiftVal | progress->GetSpecialTitles(index)));
6064  updated = true;
6065  }
6066  }
6067  else
6068  {
6069  // Normal title
6070 
6071  std::set<int16_t> existingTitles;
6072  for(int16_t title : progress->GetTitles())
6073  {
6074  existingTitles.insert(title);
6075  }
6076 
6077  // Push the new title to the end of the list and erase the last if
6078  // at max size
6079  if(existingTitles.find(titleID) == existingTitles.end())
6080  {
6081  progress->RemoveTitles(49);
6082  progress->PrependTitles(titleID);
6083  updated = true;
6084  }
6085  }
6086 
6087  if(updated)
6088  {
6089  libcomp::Packet notify;
6090  notify.WritePacketCode(
6091  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_TITLE_LIST_UPDATED);
6092  notify.WriteS16Little((int16_t)titleID);
6093 
6094  auto titles = progress->GetTitles();
6095 
6096  notify.WriteS32Little((int32_t)titles.size());
6097  for(int16_t title : titles)
6098  {
6099  notify.WriteS16Little(title);
6100  }
6101 
6102  client->SendPacket(notify);
6103 
6104  mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(progress);
6105 
6106  return true;
6107  }
6108 
6109  return false;
6110 }
6111 
6112 void CharacterManager::SendMaterials(const std::shared_ptr<
6113  ChannelClientConnection>& client, std::set<uint32_t> updates)
6114 {
6115  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6116  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6117  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
6118  auto materials = character->GetMaterials();
6119 
6120  libcomp::Packet p;
6121  if(updates.size() == 0)
6122  {
6123  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_MATERIAL_BOX);
6124 
6125  // All materials have a dissasembly entry
6126  auto disassemblyTypes = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager()
6127  ->GetDisassembledItemIDs();
6128 
6129  int32_t materialCount = (int32_t)disassemblyTypes.size();
6130  p.WriteS32Little(materialCount);
6131  for(uint32_t materialType : disassemblyTypes)
6132  {
6133  auto it = materials.find(materialType);
6134 
6135  p.WriteU32Little(materialType);
6136  p.WriteS32Little(it != materials.end() ? it->second : 0);
6137  }
6138  }
6139  else
6140  {
6141  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_MATERIAL_BOX_UPDATED);
6142 
6143  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)updates.size());
6144  for(uint32_t materialType : updates)
6145  {
6146  auto it = materials.find(materialType);
6147 
6148  p.WriteU32Little(materialType);
6149  p.WriteS32Little(it != materials.end() ? it->second : 0);
6150  }
6151  }
6152 
6153  client->SendPacket(p);
6154 }
6155 
6156 void CharacterManager::SendDevilBook(const std::shared_ptr<
6157  ChannelClientConnection>& client)
6158 {
6159  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6160  auto devilBook = state->GetAccountWorldData()->GetDevilBook();
6161 
6162  libcomp::Packet reply;
6163  reply.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DEMON_COMPENDIUM);
6164  reply.WriteS8(0); // Unknown
6165  reply.WriteU16Little((uint16_t)devilBook.size());
6166  reply.WriteArray(&devilBook, (uint32_t)devilBook.size());
6167 
6168  client->SendPacket(reply);
6169 }
6170 
6171 void CharacterManager::SendInvokeStatus(const std::shared_ptr<
6172  ChannelClientConnection>& client, bool force, bool queue)
6173 {
6174  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6175  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6176  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
6177  if(!character)
6178  {
6179  return;
6180  }
6181 
6182  cState->RefreshActionCooldowns(false);
6183 
6184  // Take the first active one found (default to neutral for "wait" only)
6185  int32_t active = COOLDOWN_INVOKE_NEUTRAL;
6186  for(int32_t invokeID : { COOLDOWN_INVOKE_LAW,
6187  COOLDOWN_INVOKE_NEUTRAL, COOLDOWN_INVOKE_CHAOS })
6188  {
6189  if(cState->ActionCooldownActive(invokeID, false, false))
6190  {
6191  active = invokeID;
6192  break;
6193  }
6194  }
6195 
6196  uint32_t systemTime = (uint32_t)std::time(0);
6197  int32_t invokeLeft = ChannelServer::GetExpirationInSeconds(
6198  character->GetActionCooldowns(active), systemTime);
6199  int32_t waitLeft = ChannelServer::GetExpirationInSeconds(
6200  character->GetActionCooldowns(COOLDOWN_INVOKE_WAIT), systemTime);
6201 
6202  if(!force && !invokeLeft && !waitLeft)
6203  {
6204  return;
6205  }
6206 
6207  libcomp::Packet p;
6208  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_PATTRIBUTE);
6209  p.WriteS8((int8_t)((active + 1) * -1)); // PAttribute ID
6210  p.WriteS32Little(invokeLeft);
6211  p.WriteS32Little(waitLeft);
6212  p.WriteS32Little(mServer.lock()->GetPAttributeDeadline());
6213 
6214  if(queue)
6215  {
6216  client->QueuePacket(p);
6217  }
6218  else
6219  {
6220  client->SendPacket(p);
6221  }
6222 }
6223 
6224 void CharacterManager::NotifyItemDistribution(
6225  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client,
6226  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::PostItem>> post)
6227 {
6228  post.sort([](const std::shared_ptr<objects::PostItem>& a,
6229  const std::shared_ptr<objects::PostItem>& b)
6230  {
6231  int32_t aMsg = a->GetDistributionMessageID();
6232  int32_t bMsg = b->GetDistributionMessageID();
6233  return (aMsg ? aMsg : 0x7FFFFFFF) <
6234  (bMsg ? bMsg : 0x7FFFFFFF) || (aMsg == bMsg &&
6235  a->GetType() < b->GetType());
6236  });
6237 
6238  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(client
6239  ->GetClientState()->GetAccountUID());
6240 
6241  for(auto p : post)
6242  {
6243  if(!p->GetDistributionMessageID()) continue;
6244 
6245  libcomp::Packet notify;
6246  notify.WritePacketCode(
6247  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_ITEM_DISTRIBUTION);
6248  notify.WriteS32Little(p->GetDistributionMessageID());
6249  notify.WriteS32Little((int32_t)p->GetType());
6250 
6251  client->QueuePacket(notify);
6252 
6253  p->SetDistributionMessageID(0);
6254  dbChanges->Update(p);
6255  }
6256 
6257  client->FlushOutgoing();
6258 
6259  mServer.lock()->GetLobbyDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
6260 }
6261 
6262 bool CharacterManager::UpdateStatusEffects(const std::shared_ptr<
6263  objects::Demon>& demon, const libobjgen::UUID& accountUID,
6264  bool queueSave)
6265 {
6266  auto server = mServer.lock();
6267  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
6268 
6269  std::list<libcomp::ObjectReference<objects::StatusEffect>> updated;
6270  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::StatusEffect>> removed;
6271 
6272  uint32_t now = (uint32_t)std::time(0);
6273  for(auto effect : demon->GetStatusEffects())
6274  {
6275  auto se = definitionManager->GetStatusData(effect->GetEffect());
6276 
6277  auto cancel = se->GetCancel();
6278  switch (cancel->GetDurationType())
6279  {
6280  case objects::MiCancelData::DurationType_t::MS:
6281  case objects::MiCancelData::DurationType_t::MS_SET:
6282  case objects::MiCancelData::DurationType_t::NONE:
6283  // Time does not decrease while not summoned
6284  updated.push_back(effect);
6285  break;
6286  default:
6287  if(!effect->GetIsConstant() && effect->GetExpiration() <= now)
6288  {
6289  removed.push_back(effect.Get());
6290  }
6291  else
6292  {
6293  updated.push_back(effect);
6294  }
6295  break;
6296  }
6297  }
6298 
6299  if(removed.size() > 0)
6300  {
6301  auto changes = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(accountUID);
6302 
6303  demon->SetStatusEffects(updated);
6304  changes->Update(demon);
6305 
6306  for(auto remove : removed)
6307  {
6308  changes->Delete(remove);
6309  }
6310 
6311  if(queueSave)
6312  {
6313  return server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(changes);
6314  }
6315  else
6316  {
6317  return server->GetWorldDatabase()->ProcessChangeSet(changes);
6318  }
6319  }
6320 
6321  return true;
6322 }
6323 
6324 bool CharacterManager::UpdateStatusEffects(const std::shared_ptr<
6325  ActiveEntityState>& eState, bool queueSave)
6326 {
6327  auto cState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(eState);
6328  auto dState = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<DemonState>(eState);
6329  if(!cState && (!dState || !dState->GetEntity()))
6330  {
6331  return false;
6332  }
6333 
6334  libobjgen::UUID accountUID;
6335  if(cState)
6336  {
6337  accountUID = cState->GetEntity()->GetAccount();
6338  }
6339  else
6340  {
6341  auto box = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::DemonBox>(
6342  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(
6343  dState->GetEntity()->GetDemonBox()));
6344  if(box)
6345  {
6346  accountUID = box->GetAccount();
6347  }
6348  }
6349 
6350  auto changes = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(accountUID);
6351 
6352  auto effectMap = eState->GetStatusEffects();
6353  std::unordered_map<uint32_t, bool> effectStates;
6354  for(auto ePair : effectMap)
6355  {
6356  // Default to insert
6357  effectStates[ePair.first] = true;
6358  }
6359 
6360  auto previous = cState
6361  ? cState->GetEntity()->GetStatusEffects()
6362  : dState->GetEntity()->GetStatusEffects();
6363  for(auto p : previous)
6364  {
6365  uint32_t effectType = p->GetEffect();
6366  if(effectStates.find(effectType) == effectStates.end())
6367  {
6368  // Delete
6369  changes->Delete(p.Get());
6370  }
6371  else
6372  {
6373  auto effectIter = effectMap.find(effectType);
6374  if(effectIter != effectMap.end() &&
6375  effectIter->second != p.Get())
6376  {
6377  // Delete old, insert new
6378  changes->Delete(p.Get());
6379  effectStates[effectType] = true;
6380  }
6381  else
6382  {
6383  // Update
6384  effectStates[effectType] = false;
6385  }
6386  }
6387  }
6388 
6389  // All removals are handled by the zone expiration logic
6390  std::list<libcomp::ObjectReference<objects::StatusEffect>> updated;
6391  for(auto ePair : effectStates)
6392  {
6393  auto effectType = ePair.first;
6394  auto effect = effectMap[effectType];
6395 
6396  // Do not save constant effects
6397  if(!effect->GetIsConstant())
6398  {
6399  updated.push_back(effect);
6400 
6401  if(!ePair.second)
6402  {
6403  changes->Update(effect);
6404  }
6405  else
6406  {
6407  changes->Insert(effect);
6408  }
6409  }
6410  }
6411 
6412  if(updated.size() == 0 && previous.size() == 0)
6413  {
6414  // Nothing to do
6415  return true;
6416  }
6417 
6418  if(cState)
6419  {
6420  cState->GetEntity()->SetStatusEffects(updated);
6421  changes->Update(cState->GetEntity());
6422  }
6423  else
6424  {
6425  dState->GetEntity()->SetStatusEffects(updated);
6426  changes->Update(dState->GetEntity());
6427  }
6428 
6429  auto db = mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase();
6430  if(queueSave)
6431  {
6432  return db->QueueChangeSet(changes);
6433  }
6434  else
6435  {
6436  return db->ProcessChangeSet(changes);
6437  }
6438 }
6439 
6440 bool CharacterManager::AddStatusEffectImmediate(
6441  const std::shared_ptr<ChannelClientConnection>& client,
6442  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState,
6443  const StatusEffectChanges& effects)
6444 {
6445  auto server = mServer.lock();
6446 
6447  auto removes = eState->AddStatusEffects(effects,
6448  server->GetDefinitionManager(), 0, false);
6449 
6450  auto allEffects = eState->GetStatusEffects();
6451 
6452  std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::StatusEffect>> added;
6453  for(auto& addEffect : effects)
6454  {
6455  auto it = allEffects.find(addEffect.first);
6456  if(it != allEffects.end())
6457  {
6458  added.push_back(it->second);
6459  }
6460  }
6461 
6462  if(added.size() > 0)
6463  {
6464  libcomp::Packet p;
6465  if(GetActiveStatusesPacket(p, eState->GetEntityID(), added))
6466  {
6467  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, p);
6468  }
6469  }
6470 
6471  if(removes.size() > 0)
6472  {
6473  libcomp::Packet p;
6474  if(GetRemovedStatusesPacket(p, eState->GetEntityID(), removes))
6475  {
6476  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, p);
6477  }
6478  }
6479 
6480  return added.size() > 0;
6481 }
6482 
6483 void CharacterManager::CancelStatusEffects(const std::shared_ptr<
6484  ChannelClientConnection>& client, uint8_t cancelFlags)
6485 {
6486  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6487  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6488  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
6489  auto zone = state->GetZone();
6490 
6491  int32_t cEntityID = cState->GetEntityID();
6492  int32_t dEntityID = dState->GetEntityID();
6493 
6494  std::unordered_map<int32_t, std::set<uint32_t>> cancelMap;
6495  cancelMap[cEntityID] = cState->CancelStatusEffects(cancelFlags);
6496  cancelMap[dEntityID] = dState->CancelStatusEffects(cancelFlags);
6497 
6498  if(zone && (cancelFlags & EFFECT_CANCEL_ZONEOUT) != 0)
6499  {
6500  // Cancel invalid ride effects
6501  if(zone->GetDefinition()->GetMountDisabled())
6502  {
6503  CancelMount(state);
6504  }
6505 
6506  if(zone->GetDefinition()->GetBikeDisabled())
6507  {
6508  std::set<uint32_t> rideEffects;
6509  rideEffects.insert(SVR_CONST.STATUS_BIKE);
6510 
6511  bool cancelled = false;
6512  for(uint32_t effectType : cState->ExpireStatusEffects(rideEffects))
6513  {
6514  cancelMap[cEntityID].insert(effectType);
6515  cancelled = true;
6516  }
6517 
6518  if(cancelled)
6519  {
6520  RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(cState, client);
6521  }
6522  }
6523  }
6524 
6525  auto definitionManager = mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager();
6526  for(auto demon : cState->GetEntity()->GetCOMP()->GetDemons())
6527  {
6528  if(!demon.Get() || demon.Get() == dState->GetEntity()) continue;
6529 
6530  auto effects = demon->GetStatusEffects();
6531 
6532  std::set<size_t> cancelled;
6533  for(auto effect : effects)
6534  {
6535  auto cancel = definitionManager->
6536  GetStatusData(effect->GetEffect())->GetCancel();
6537  if(cancel->GetCancelTypes() & cancelFlags)
6538  {
6539  cancelled.insert(effect->GetEffect());
6540  }
6541  }
6542 
6543  effects.remove_if([cancelled]
6544  (libcomp::ObjectReference<objects::StatusEffect>& effect)
6545  {
6546  return cancelled.find(effect->GetEffect())
6547  != cancelled.end();
6548  });
6549 
6550  if(cancelled.size() > 0)
6551  {
6552  demon->SetStatusEffects(effects);
6553  }
6554  }
6555 
6556  if(cancelMap.size() > 0)
6557  {
6558  auto zoneManager = mServer.lock()->GetZoneManager();
6559 
6560  for(auto& pair : cancelMap)
6561  {
6562  if(pair.second.size() > 0)
6563  {
6564  libcomp::Packet p;
6565  if(GetRemovedStatusesPacket(p, pair.first, pair.second))
6566  {
6567  if(zone)
6568  {
6569  zoneManager->BroadcastPacket(zone, p);
6570  }
6571  else
6572  {
6573  client->QueuePacket(p);
6574  }
6575  }
6576  }
6577  }
6578 
6579  client->FlushOutgoing();
6580  }
6581 }
6582 
6583 bool CharacterManager::CancelMount(ClientState* state)
6584 {
6585  if(state)
6586  {
6587  auto server = mServer.lock();
6588  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
6589 
6590  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6591  auto dState = state->GetDemonState();
6592 
6593  if(!cState->IsMounted() && !dState->IsMounted())
6594  {
6595  return false;
6596  }
6597 
6598  for(uint32_t skillID : definitionManager->GetFunctionIDSkills(
6599  SVR_CONST.SKILL_MOUNT))
6600  {
6601  cState->RemoveActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
6602  dState->RemoveActiveSwitchSkills(skillID);
6603  }
6604 
6605  // Manually remove the effects before recalculating
6606  const std::set<uint32_t> mountEffects =
6607  {
6608  SVR_CONST.STATUS_MOUNT,
6609  SVR_CONST.STATUS_MOUNT_SUPER
6610  };
6611 
6612  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> eStates;
6613  eStates.push_back(cState);
6614  eStates.push_back(dState);
6615 
6616  for(auto eState : eStates)
6617  {
6618  auto expired = eState->ExpireStatusEffects(mountEffects);
6619  if(expired.size() > 0)
6620  {
6621  libcomp::Packet p;
6622  if(GetRemovedStatusesPacket(p, eState->GetEntityID(), expired))
6623  {
6624  mServer.lock()->GetZoneManager()
6625  ->BroadcastPacket(eState->GetZone(), p);
6626  }
6627  }
6628  }
6629 
6630  server->GetTokuseiManager()->Recalculate(cState, true);
6631 
6632  return true;
6633  }
6634 
6635  return false;
6636 }
6637 
6638 bool CharacterManager::GetActiveStatusesPacket(libcomp::Packet& p, int32_t entityID,
6639  const std::list<std::shared_ptr<objects::StatusEffect>>& active)
6640 {
6641  if(active.size() == 0)
6642  {
6643  return false;
6644  }
6645 
6646  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_ADD_STATUS_EFFECT);
6647  p.WriteS32Little(entityID);
6648  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)active.size());
6649 
6650  for(auto& effect : active)
6651  {
6652  p.WriteU32Little(effect->GetEffect());
6653  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)effect->GetExpiration());
6654  p.WriteU8(effect->GetStack());
6655  }
6656 
6657  return true;
6658 }
6659 
6660 bool CharacterManager::GetRemovedStatusesPacket(libcomp::Packet& p,
6661  int32_t entityID, const std::set<uint32_t>& removed)
6662 {
6663  if(removed.size() == 0)
6664  {
6665  return false;
6666  }
6667 
6668  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_REMOVE_STATUS_EFFECT);
6669  p.WriteS32Little(entityID);
6670  p.WriteU32Little((uint32_t)removed.size());
6671  for(uint32_t effectType : removed)
6672  {
6673  p.WriteU32Little(effectType);
6674  }
6675 
6676  return true;
6677 }
6678 
6679 bool CharacterManager::AddRemoveOpponent(
6680  bool add, const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState1,
6681  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& eState2)
6682 {
6683  auto zone = eState1->GetZone();
6684  if(!zone || (add && !eState2))
6685  {
6686  return false;
6687  }
6688 
6689  // Battle ends in 10s if no new one hits again
6690  uint64_t timeout = (uint64_t)(
6691  ChannelServer::GetServerTime() + 10000000ULL);
6692  if(add && eState1->HasOpponent(eState2->GetEntityID()))
6693  {
6694  // Refresh the timeouts
6695  zone->StartStopCombat(eState1->GetEntityID(), timeout);
6696  if(eState2)
6697  {
6698  zone->StartStopCombat(eState2->GetEntityID(), timeout);
6699  }
6700 
6701  return true;
6702  }
6703 
6704  std::list<libcomp::Packet> packets;
6705  if(add)
6706  {
6707  // If one isn't alive, stop here
6708  if(!eState1->IsAlive() || !eState2->IsAlive())
6709  {
6710  return true;
6711  }
6712 
6713  // If either are a client entity, get both the character
6714  // and partner demon
6715  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> e1s;
6716  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> e2s;
6717 
6718  for(size_t i = 0; i < 2; i++)
6719  {
6720  auto entity = i == 0 ? eState1 : eState2;
6721  auto state = entity ? ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
6722  entity->GetEntityID()) : nullptr;
6723  auto& l = (i == 0) ? e1s : e2s;
6724  if(state)
6725  {
6726  l.push_back(state->GetCharacterState());
6727  l.push_back(state->GetDemonState());
6728  }
6729  else
6730  {
6731  l.push_back(entity);
6732  }
6733  }
6734 
6735  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> battleStarted;
6736  for(auto e1 : e1s)
6737  {
6738  if(!e1->Ready()) continue;
6739 
6740  for(auto e2 : e2s)
6741  {
6742  if(!e2->Ready()) continue;
6743 
6744  e1->AddRemoveOpponent(true, e2->GetEntityID());
6745  if(zone->StartStopCombat(e1->GetEntityID(), timeout))
6746  {
6747  battleStarted.push_back(e1);
6748  }
6749 
6750  e2->AddRemoveOpponent(true, e1->GetEntityID());
6751  if(zone->StartStopCombat(e2->GetEntityID(), timeout))
6752  {
6753  battleStarted.push_back(e2);
6754  }
6755  }
6756  }
6757 
6758  for(auto entity : battleStarted)
6759  {
6760  auto activated = entity->GetActivatedAbility();
6761  if(SkillManager::SkillHasMoreUses(activated))
6762  {
6763  // If a skill is pending, verify that the charge speed is still
6764  // valid with the new opponent(s) added
6765  auto speeds = SkillManager::GetMovementSpeeds(entity,
6766  activated->GetSkillData());
6767  if(speeds.second != activated->GetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed())
6768  {
6769  activated->SetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed(speeds.second);
6770  }
6771  }
6772 
6773  auto aiState = entity->GetAIState();
6774  if(aiState)
6775  {
6776  aiState->SetStatus(AIStatus_t::COMBAT);
6777  }
6778 
6779  libcomp::Packet p;
6780  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_BATTLE_STARTED);
6781  p.WriteS32Little(entity->GetEntityID());
6782  p.WriteFloat(entity->GetMovementSpeed());
6783  packets.push_back(p);
6784  }
6785  }
6786  else
6787  {
6788  int32_t e1ID = eState1->GetEntityID();
6789  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> opponents;
6790  if(eState2)
6791  {
6792  opponents.push_back(eState2);
6793  eState1->AddRemoveOpponent(false, eState2->GetEntityID());
6794  }
6795  else
6796  {
6797  auto opponentIDs = eState1->GetOpponentIDs();
6798  for(int32_t oppID : opponentIDs)
6799  {
6800  eState1->AddRemoveOpponent(false, oppID);
6801 
6802  auto opponent = zone->GetActiveEntity(oppID);
6803  if(opponent)
6804  {
6805  opponents.push_back(opponent);
6806  }
6807  }
6808 
6809  if(zone->StartStopCombat(eState1->GetEntityID(), 0))
6810  {
6811  // Notify player entities
6812  auto state = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(eState1
6813  ->GetEntityID());
6814  if(state)
6815  {
6816  std::list<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>> entities;
6817  entities.push_back(state->GetCharacterState());
6818  entities.push_back(state->GetDemonState());
6819 
6820  for(auto entity : entities)
6821  {
6822  auto activated = entity->GetActivatedAbility();
6823  if(SkillManager::SkillHasMoreUses(activated))
6824  {
6825  // If a skill is pending, verify that the charge
6826  // speed is still valid with combat ending
6827  auto speeds = SkillManager::GetMovementSpeeds(
6828  entity, activated->GetSkillData());
6829  if(speeds.second != activated
6830  ->GetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed())
6831  {
6832  activated->SetChargeCompleteMoveSpeed(
6833  speeds.second);
6834  }
6835  }
6836 
6837  libcomp::Packet p;
6838  p.WritePacketCode(ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::
6839  PACKET_BATTLE_STOPPED);
6840  p.WriteS32Little(entity->GetEntityID());
6841  p.WriteFloat(entity->GetMovementSpeed());
6842 
6843  packets.push_back(p);
6844  }
6845  }
6846  }
6847  }
6848 
6849  for(auto opponent : opponents)
6850  {
6851  opponent->AddRemoveOpponent(false, e1ID);
6852  }
6853  }
6854 
6855  if(packets.size() > 0)
6856  {
6857  auto zoneConnections = zone->GetConnectionList();
6858  ChannelClientConnection::BroadcastPackets(zoneConnections, packets);
6859  }
6860 
6861  return true;
6862 }
6863 
6864 bool CharacterManager::UpdateDigitalizePoints(const std::shared_ptr<
6865  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
6866  const std::unordered_map<uint8_t, int32_t>& pointMap, bool allowAdjust,
6867  bool validate)
6868 {
6869  auto server = mServer.lock();
6870  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
6871 
6872  auto state = client->GetClientState();
6873  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
6874  auto dgState = cState->GetDigitalizeState();
6875  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
6876  auto progress = character ? character->GetProgress().Get() : nullptr;
6877  if(!progress)
6878  {
6879  return false;
6880  }
6881 
6882  auto startingLevels = progress->GetDigitalizeLevels();
6883  auto validRaceIDs = definitionManager->GetGuardianRaceIDs();
6884 
6885  bool validExists = false;
6886 
6887  std::set<uint8_t> pointsUpdated;
6888  std::set<uint8_t> levelUpdated;
6889  for(auto& pair : pointMap)
6890  {
6891  uint8_t raceID = pair.first;
6892 
6893  if(validRaceIDs.find(raceID) == validRaceIDs.end()) continue;
6894 
6895  int8_t lvl = progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(raceID);
6896  int32_t points = progress->GetDigitalizePoints(raceID);
6897 
6898  if(!lvl)
6899  {
6900  // Make sure its unlocked or unlockable
6901  auto unlockData = definitionManager->GetGuardianUnlockData(raceID);
6902  if(unlockData && validate)
6903  {
6904  bool unlockable = true;
6905  for(size_t i = 0; i < unlockData->RequirementsCount(); )
6906  {
6907  uint8_t r = unlockData->GetRequirements(i);
6908  uint8_t l = unlockData->GetRequirements((size_t)(i + 1));
6909 
6910  if(r && progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(r) < (int8_t)l)
6911  {
6912  unlockable = false;
6913  break;
6914  }
6915 
6916  i += 2;
6917  }
6918 
6919  if(!unlockable) continue;
6920  }
6921 
6922  lvl = 1;
6923  progress->SetDigitalizeLevels(raceID, lvl);
6924  pointsUpdated.insert(raceID);
6925  levelUpdated.insert(raceID);
6926  }
6927 
6928  validExists = true;
6929 
6930  // If validating and the current race is the digitalize race,
6931  // apply mitama level limit
6932  int8_t levelCap = 10;
6933  if(validate && dgState && dgState->GetRaceID() == raceID)
6934  {
6935  auto devilData = definitionManager->GetDevilData(
6936  dgState->GetDemon()->GetType());
6937  if(!IsMitamaDemon(devilData))
6938  {
6939  levelCap = 5;
6940  }
6941  }
6942 
6943  if(lvl < levelCap && pair.second > 0)
6944  {
6945  int32_t addPoints = pair.second;
6946  if(allowAdjust)
6947  {
6948  double rateAdjust = 1.0 + (server->GetTokuseiManager()
6949  ->GetAspectSum(cState,
6950  TokuseiAspectType::DIGITALIZE_POINT_RATE) * 0.01);
6951 
6952  addPoints = (int32_t)((double)addPoints * rateAdjust);
6953 
6954  if(addPoints <= 0) continue;
6955  }
6956 
6957  int32_t newPoints = points + addPoints;
6958 
6959  auto levelData = definitionManager->GetGuardianLevelData(raceID);
6960  auto currentLevel = levelData->GetLevels((size_t)lvl);
6961  while(currentLevel &&
6962  newPoints >= (int32_t)currentLevel->GetNextXP())
6963  {
6964  newPoints = newPoints - (int32_t)currentLevel->GetNextXP();
6965 
6966  lvl++;
6967  progress->SetDigitalizeLevels(raceID, lvl);
6968  currentLevel = levelData->GetLevels((size_t)lvl);
6969 
6970  levelUpdated.insert(raceID);
6971 
6972  if(lvl == levelCap)
6973  {
6974  newPoints = 0;
6975  break;
6976  }
6977  }
6978 
6979  if(!currentLevel)
6980  {
6981  // Shouldn't happen but just in case the level data is not
6982  // valid, do not blindly add points forever
6983  newPoints = 0;
6984  }
6985 
6986  progress->SetDigitalizePoints(raceID, newPoints);
6987  pointsUpdated.insert(raceID);
6988  }
6989  }
6990 
6991  if(levelUpdated.size() > 0)
6992  {
6993  // Unlock any new races affected
6994  for(uint8_t raceID : validRaceIDs)
6995  {
6996  auto unlockData = progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(raceID) == 0
6997  ? definitionManager->GetGuardianUnlockData(raceID) : nullptr;
6998  if(unlockData)
6999  {
7000  bool unlockable = true;
7001  for(size_t i = 0; i < unlockData->RequirementsCount(); )
7002  {
7003  uint8_t r = unlockData->GetRequirements(i);
7004  uint8_t l = unlockData->GetRequirements((size_t)(i + 1));
7005 
7006  if(r && progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(r) < (int8_t)l)
7007  {
7008  unlockable = false;
7009  break;
7010  }
7011 
7012  i += 2;
7013  }
7014 
7015  if(unlockable)
7016  {
7017  progress->SetDigitalizeLevels(raceID, 1);
7018  pointsUpdated.insert(raceID);
7019  levelUpdated.insert(raceID);
7020  }
7021  }
7022  }
7023 
7024  // Learn any digitalize extend skills not available
7025  for(uint8_t raceID : levelUpdated)
7026  {
7027  auto levelData = definitionManager->GetGuardianLevelData(raceID);
7028  int8_t lvl = progress->GetDigitalizeLevels((size_t)raceID);
7029  for(size_t i = 1; i <= (size_t)lvl; i++)
7030  {
7031  auto currentLevel = levelData->GetLevels(i);
7032  uint32_t skillID = currentLevel->GetExtendSkillID();
7033  if(skillID && skillID != static_cast<uint32_t>(-1) &&
7034  !character->LearnedSkillsContains(skillID))
7035  {
7036  LearnSkill(client, cState->GetEntityID(), skillID);
7037  }
7038  }
7039  }
7040  }
7041 
7042  if(pointsUpdated.size() > 0 || levelUpdated.size() > 0)
7043  {
7044  if(pointsUpdated.size() > 0)
7045  {
7046  libcomp::Packet p;
7047  p.WritePacketCode(
7048  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DIGITALIZE_POINTS_UPDATE);
7049 
7050  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)pointsUpdated.size());
7051  for(uint8_t raceID : pointsUpdated)
7052  {
7053  int8_t lvl = progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(raceID);
7054  int32_t points = progress->GetDigitalizePoints(raceID);
7055 
7056  p.WriteU8(raceID);
7057  p.WriteS8(lvl);
7058  p.WriteS32Little(points);
7059  }
7060 
7061  client->QueuePacket(p);
7062  }
7063 
7064  if(levelUpdated.size() > 0)
7065  {
7066  libcomp::Packet p;
7067  p.WritePacketCode(
7068  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DIGITALIZE_LEVEL_UP);
7069  p.WriteS32Little(cState->GetEntityID());
7070 
7071  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)pointsUpdated.size());
7072  for(uint8_t raceID : levelUpdated)
7073  {
7074  int8_t lvl = progress->GetDigitalizeLevels(raceID);
7075 
7076  auto it = startingLevels.find(raceID);
7077  int8_t previousLvl = it != startingLevels.end()
7078  ? it->second : (int8_t)0;
7079 
7080  p.WriteU8(raceID);
7081  p.WriteS8(previousLvl);
7082  p.WriteS8(lvl);
7083  }
7084 
7085  server->GetZoneManager()->BroadcastPacket(client, p, true);
7086  }
7087 
7088  client->FlushOutgoing();
7089 
7090  server->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueUpdate(progress);
7091  }
7092 
7093  return validExists;
7094 }
7095 
7096 bool CharacterManager::DigitalizeStart(const std::shared_ptr<
7097  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
7098  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon>& demon)
7099 {
7100  auto state = client->GetClientState();
7101  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
7102  auto dgState = cState->GetDigitalizeState();
7103  if(dgState)
7104  {
7105  // Already digitalized, end previous
7106  if(!DigitalizeEnd(client))
7107  {
7108  return false;
7109  }
7110  }
7111 
7112  auto character = cState->GetEntity();
7113  auto comp = character ? character->GetCOMP().Get() : nullptr;
7114  if(!demon || !comp || demon->GetDemonBox() != comp->GetUUID())
7115  {
7116  // Demon is not in the COMP
7117  return false;
7118  }
7119 
7120  uint8_t dgAbility = cState->GetDigitalizeAbilityLevel();
7121  auto zone = cState->GetZone();
7122  if(dgAbility == 0 || !zone)
7123  {
7124  // Digitalize not valid
7125  return false;
7126  }
7127 
7128  bool dgZone = zone->GetInstanceType() == InstanceType_t::DIGITALIZE;
7129  if(!dgZone)
7130  {
7131  const uint32_t dgCdStatus = SVR_CONST.STATUS_DIGITALIZE_COOLDOWN;
7132 
7133  UpdateStatusEffects(demon, state->GetAccountUID(), true);
7134 
7135  for(auto effect : demon->GetStatusEffects())
7136  {
7137  if(effect->GetEffect() == dgCdStatus)
7138  {
7139  // Cooldown is still active
7140  return false;
7141  }
7142  }
7143  }
7144 
7145  // Perform valid digitalize
7146  auto server = mServer.lock();
7147  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
7148 
7149  dgState = cState->Digitalize(demon, definitionManager);
7150  if(!dgState)
7151  {
7152  return false;
7153  }
7154 
7155  uint32_t time = 0;
7156  if(!dgZone)
7157  {
7158  // Determine duration (in milliseconds)
7159  auto devilData = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demon->GetType());
7160  time = (uint32_t)(IsMitamaDemon(devilData) ? 360000 : 180000);
7161  time += (uint32_t)(dgState->GetTimeExtension() * 1000);
7162 
7163  double adjust = 1.0 + (server->GetTokuseiManager()->GetAspectSum(
7164  cState, TokuseiAspectType::DIGITALIZE_LENGTH) * 0.01);
7165  if(adjust != 1.0)
7166  {
7167  time = (uint32_t)((double)time * adjust);
7168  }
7169  }
7170  else
7171  {
7172  // Not ACTUALLY infinite but this is the duration used to
7173  // communicate infinity
7174  time = 604800000;
7175  dgState->SetTimeLimited(false);
7176  }
7177 
7178  uint32_t statusEffectID = SVR_CONST.STATUS_DIGITALIZE[
7179  (size_t)cState->GetGender()];
7180 
7181  StatusEffectChanges effects;
7182  effects[statusEffectID] = StatusEffectChange(statusEffectID, 1, true);
7183  effects[statusEffectID].Duration = time;
7184 
7185  AddStatusEffectImmediate(client, cState, effects);
7186 
7187  libcomp::Packet p;
7188  p.WritePacketCode(
7189  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DIGITALIZE_START);
7190  p.WriteS64Little(state->GetObjectID(demon->GetUUID()));
7191  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)(time / 1000)); // Time in seconds
7192 
7193  client->QueuePacket(p);
7194 
7195  RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(cState, client);
7196 
7197  client->FlushOutgoing();
7198 
7199  return true;
7200 }
7201 
7202 bool CharacterManager::DigitalizeEnd(const std::shared_ptr<
7203  channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client)
7204 {
7205  if(!client)
7206  {
7207  return false;
7208  }
7209 
7210  auto state = client->GetClientState();
7211  auto cState = state->GetCharacterState();
7212  auto dgState = cState->GetDigitalizeState();
7213  if(!dgState)
7214  {
7215  // Not digitalized
7216  return false;
7217  }
7218 
7219  auto demon = dgState->GetDemon().Get();
7220  cState->Digitalize(nullptr, nullptr);
7221 
7222  int32_t time = 0;
7223  if(demon && dgState->GetTimeLimited())
7224  {
7225  // Add cooldown to demon (in seconds)
7226  time = (int32_t)SVR_CONST.DIGITALIZE_COOLDOWN;
7227  time -= dgState->GetCooldownReduction();
7228  if(time > 0)
7229  {
7230  auto dbChanges = libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet::Create(state
7231  ->GetAccountUID());
7232 
7233  auto cd = libcomp::PersistentObject::New<objects::StatusEffect>(
7234  true);
7235  cd->SetEntity(demon->GetUUID());
7236  cd->SetEffect(SVR_CONST.STATUS_DIGITALIZE_COOLDOWN);
7237  cd->SetStack(1);
7238  cd->SetExpiration((uint32_t)((int32_t)std::time(0) + time));
7239  dbChanges->Insert(cd);
7240 
7241  demon->AppendStatusEffects(cd);
7242  dbChanges->Update(demon);
7243 
7244  SendDemonBoxData(client, 0, { demon->GetBoxSlot() });
7245 
7246  mServer.lock()->GetWorldDatabase()->QueueChangeSet(dbChanges);
7247  }
7248  }
7249 
7250  StatusEffectChanges effects;
7251  for(uint32_t effectID : SVR_CONST.STATUS_DIGITALIZE)
7252  {
7253  effects[effectID] = StatusEffectChange(effectID, 0, true);
7254  }
7255 
7256  AddStatusEffectImmediate(client, cState, effects);
7257 
7258  libcomp::Packet p;
7259  p.WritePacketCode(
7260  ChannelToClientPacketCode_t::PACKET_DIGITALIZE_END);
7261  p.WriteS64Little(demon ? state->GetObjectID(demon->GetUUID()) : -1);
7262  p.WriteS32Little(time); // Time in seconds
7263 
7264  client->QueuePacket(p);
7265 
7266  RecalculateTokuseiAndStats(cState, client);
7267 
7268  client->FlushOutgoing();
7269 
7270  return true;
7271 }
7272 
7273 void CharacterManager::UpdateWorldDisplayState(
7274  const std::set<std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>>& entities)
7275 {
7276  if(entities.size() > 0)
7277  {
7278  auto worldConnection = mServer.lock()->GetManagerConnection()
7279  ->GetWorldConnection();
7280  for(auto entity : entities)
7281  {
7282  auto entityClientState = ClientState::GetEntityClientState(
7283  entity->GetEntityID());
7284  if(!entityClientState || !entityClientState->GetPartyID()) continue;
7285 
7286  libcomp::Packet packet;
7287  if(entity->GetEntityType() == EntityType_t::PARTNER_DEMON)
7288  {
7289  entityClientState->GetPartyDemonPacket(packet);
7290  }
7291  else
7292  {
7293  entityClientState->GetPartyCharacterPacket(packet);
7294  }
7295  worldConnection->QueuePacket(packet);
7296  }
7297 
7298  worldConnection->FlushOutgoing();
7299  }
7300 }
7301 
7302 void CharacterManager::CalculateCharacterBaseStats(const std::shared_ptr<objects::EntityStats>& cs)
7303 {
7304  auto stats = GetCharacterBaseStats(cs);
7305 
7306  CalculateDependentStats(stats, cs->GetLevel(), false);
7307 
7308  cs->SetMaxHP(stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX]);
7309  cs->SetMaxMP(stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX]);
7310  cs->SetCLSR((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR]);
7311  cs->SetLNGR((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR]);
7312  cs->SetSPELL((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL]);
7313  cs->SetSUPPORT((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT]);
7314  cs->SetPDEF((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::PDEF]);
7315  cs->SetMDEF((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::MDEF]);
7316 }
7317 
7318 void CharacterManager::CalculateDemonBaseStats(
7319  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon>& demon,
7320  std::shared_ptr<objects::EntityStats> ds,
7321  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData> demonData, bool setHPMP)
7322 {
7323  auto server = mServer.lock();
7324  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
7325 
7326  if(demon)
7327  {
7328  ds = demon->GetCoreStats().Get();
7329  demonData = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demon->GetType());
7330  }
7331 
7332  int8_t level = ds->GetLevel();
7333  uint8_t growthType = 0;
7334  if(demon)
7335  {
7336  growthType = demon->GetGrowthType();
7337  }
7338 
7339  auto stats = GetDemonBaseStats(demonData, definitionManager, growthType,
7340  level);
7341  if(demon)
7342  {
7343  AdjustDemonBaseStats(demon, stats, true);
7344  AdjustMitamaStats(demon, stats, definitionManager, 1, 0);
7345  }
7346 
7347  // Apply core stats
7348  ds->SetSTR((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::STR]);
7349  ds->SetMAGIC((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC]);
7350  ds->SetVIT((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::VIT]);
7351  ds->SetINTEL((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::INT]);
7352  ds->SetSPEED((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED]);
7353  ds->SetLUCK((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::LUCK]);
7354 
7355  if(demon)
7356  {
7357  // Familiarity boost is applied from the base growth type, not the
7358  // current growth type
7359  auto levelRate = definitionManager->GetDevilLVUpRateData(
7360  demonData->GetGrowth()->GetGrowthType());
7361  FamiliarityBoostStats(demon->GetFamiliarity(), stats, levelRate);
7362  }
7363 
7364  CalculateDependentStats(stats, level, true);
7365 
7366  AdjustStatBounds(stats, demon != nullptr);
7367 
7368  ds->SetMaxHP(stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX]);
7369  ds->SetMaxMP(stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX]);
7370  ds->SetCLSR((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR]);
7371  ds->SetLNGR((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR]);
7372  ds->SetSPELL((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL]);
7373  ds->SetSUPPORT((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT]);
7374  ds->SetPDEF((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::PDEF]);
7375  ds->SetMDEF((int16_t)stats[CorrectTbl::MDEF]);
7376 
7377  if(setHPMP)
7378  {
7379  ds->SetHP(stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX]);
7380  ds->SetMP(stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX]);
7381  }
7382 }
7383 
7384 libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t> CharacterManager::GetDemonBaseStats(
7385  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData>& demonData)
7386 {
7387  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t> stats;
7388 
7389  auto battleData = demonData->GetBattleData();
7390  for(size_t i = 0; i < 126; i++)
7391  {
7392  CorrectTbl tblID = (CorrectTbl)i;
7393  stats[tblID] = battleData->GetCorrect((size_t)i);
7394  }
7395 
7396  return stats;
7397  }
7398 
7399 libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t> CharacterManager::GetDemonBaseStats(
7400  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData>& demonData,
7401  libcomp::DefinitionManager* definitionManager, uint8_t growthType,
7402  int8_t level)
7403 {
7404  auto stats = GetDemonBaseStats(demonData);
7405 
7406  if(!growthType)
7407  {
7408  growthType = demonData->GetGrowth()->GetGrowthType();
7409  }
7410 
7411  /* Boost stats using this table
7412  * A | 1
7413  * A | 5, 9, 13, 17, 21,
7414  * B | 25, 29, 33, 37, 41,
7415  * C | 45, 49, 53, 57, 61,
7416  * D | 65, 69, 73, 77, 81,
7417  * D | 85, 89, 93, 97
7418  */
7419  auto baseLevelRate = definitionManager->GetDevilLVUpRateData(growthType);
7420 
7421  uint8_t boostLevel = static_cast<uint8_t>((level + 3) / 4);
7422  uint8_t boostStage = static_cast<uint8_t>((boostLevel - 1) / 5);
7423  switch(boostStage)
7424  {
7425  case 0:
7426  case 1:
7427  // stats = A * boostLevel;
7428  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(0), boostLevel);
7429  break;
7430  case 2:
7431  // stats = A * 6 + B * (boostLevel - 6);
7432  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(0), 6);
7433  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(1), boostLevel - 6);
7434  break;
7435  case 3:
7436  // stats = A * 6 + B * 5 + C * (boostLevel - 11);
7437  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(0), 6);
7438  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(1), 5);
7439  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(2), boostLevel - 11);
7440  break;
7441  case 4:
7442  // stats = A * 6 + B * 5 + C * 5 + D * (boostLevel - 16);
7443  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(0), 6);
7444  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(1), 5);
7445  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(2), 5);
7446  BoostStats(stats, baseLevelRate->GetLevelUpData(3), boostLevel - 16);
7447  break;
7448  default:
7449  break;
7450  }
7451 
7452  return stats;
7453 }
7454 
7455 void CharacterManager::FamiliarityBoostStats(uint16_t familiarity,
7456  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t>& stats,
7457  std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilLVUpRateData> levelRate)
7458 {
7459  int8_t familiarityRank = GetFamiliarityRank(familiarity);
7460  if(familiarityRank < 0)
7461  {
7462  // Ranks below zero have boost data 0-2 subtracted
7463  for(int8_t i = familiarityRank; i < 0; i++)
7464  {
7465  size_t famBoost = (size_t)(abs(i) - 1);
7466  BoostStats(stats, levelRate->GetLevelUpData(famBoost), -1);
7467  }
7468  }
7469  else if(familiarityRank > 0)
7470  {
7471  // Ranks above zero have boost data 0-3 added
7472  for(int8_t i = 0; i < familiarityRank; i++)
7473  {
7474  size_t famBoost = (size_t)i;
7475  BoostStats(stats, levelRate->GetLevelUpData(famBoost), 1);
7476  }
7477  }
7478 }
7479 
7480 void CharacterManager::AdjustDemonBaseStats(const std::shared_ptr<
7481  objects::Demon>& demon, libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t>& stats,
7482  bool baseCalc, bool readOnly)
7483 {
7484  if(!demon)
7485  {
7486  return;
7487  }
7488  else if(baseCalc && !readOnly)
7489  {
7490  // Reset base values initialized here
7491  demon->SetMagReduction(0);
7492  }
7493 
7494  // Apply reunion boosts
7495  auto reunionBonuses = demon->GetReunion();
7496  for(size_t i = 0; i < 12; i++)
7497  {
7498  int8_t reunionRank = reunionBonuses[i];
7499  if(reunionRank > 1)
7500  {
7501  int8_t rBoost = (int8_t)(reunionRank - 1);
7502  switch(i)
7503  {
7504  case 0: // Tiwaz (テイワズ)
7505  stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] = (int32_t)(
7506  stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] + 4 * rBoost);
7507  break;
7508  case 1: // Peorth (ペオース)
7509  stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] = (int32_t)(
7510  stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] + 4 * rBoost);
7511  break;
7512  case 2: // Eoh (エオー)
7513  stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] = (int32_t)(
7514  stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] + 4 * rBoost);
7515  break;
7516  case 3: // Eihwaz (エイワズ)
7517  stats[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT] = (int32_t)(
7518  stats[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT] + 4 * rBoost);
7519  break;
7520  case 4: // Uruz (ウルズ)
7521  stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] = (int32_t)(
7522  stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] + 2 * rBoost);
7523  stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] = (int32_t)(
7524  stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] + 2 * rBoost);
7525  break;
7526  case 5: // Hagalaz (ハガラズ)
7527  stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] = (int32_t)(
7528  stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] + 2 * rBoost);
7529  stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] = (int32_t)(
7530  stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] + 2 * rBoost);
7531  break;
7532  case 6: // Laguz (ラグズ)
7533  stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] = (int32_t)(
7534  stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] + 2 * rBoost);
7535  stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] = (int32_t)(
7536  stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] + 2 * rBoost);
7537  break;
7538  case 7: // Ansuz (アンサズ)
7539  stats[CorrectTbl::MDEF] = (int32_t)(
7540  stats[CorrectTbl::MDEF] + 5 * rBoost);
7541  break;
7542  case 8: // Nauthiz (ナウシズ)
7543  stats[CorrectTbl::PDEF] = (int32_t)(
7544  stats[CorrectTbl::PDEF] + 5 * rBoost);
7545  break;
7546  case 9: // Ingwaz (イング)
7547  if(baseCalc && !readOnly)
7548  {
7549  int32_t reduction = (5 * rBoost);
7550 
7551  // Cap at 100%
7552  if(reduction > 100)
7553  {
7554  reduction = 100;
7555  }
7556 
7557  demon->SetMagReduction((int8_t)reduction);
7558  }
7559  break;
7560  case 10: // Sigel (シーグル)
7561  if(baseCalc)
7562  {
7563  stats[CorrectTbl::STR] = (int32_t)(
7564  stats[CorrectTbl::STR] + 3 * rBoost);
7565  stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] = (int32_t)(
7566  stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] + 3 * rBoost);
7567  stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] = (int32_t)(
7568  stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] + 3 * rBoost);
7569  stats[CorrectTbl::INT] = (int32_t)(
7570  stats[CorrectTbl::INT] + 3 * rBoost);
7571  stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] = (int32_t)(
7572  stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] + 3 * rBoost);
7573  stats[CorrectTbl::LUCK] = (int32_t)(
7574  stats[CorrectTbl::LUCK] + 3 * rBoost);
7575  }
7576  break;
7577  case 11: // Wyrd (ウィアド)
7578  stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] = (int32_t)(
7579  stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] + 40 * rBoost);
7580  stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] = (int32_t)(
7581  stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] + 10 * rBoost);
7582  break;
7583  default:
7584  break;
7585  }
7586  }
7587  }
7588 
7589  // Add demon force if not performing a base calculation
7590  if(!baseCalc)
7591  {
7592  for(size_t i = 0; i < 20; i++)
7593  {
7594  int32_t fVal = demon->GetForceValues(i);
7595 
7596  // Only apply if at least one point has been achieved
7597  if(fVal >= DEMON_FORCE_PRECISION)
7598  {
7599  CorrectTbl tblID = (CorrectTbl)libcomp::
7600  DEMON_FORCE_CONVERSION[i];
7601  stats[tblID] = (int32_t)(stats[tblID] +
7602  fVal / DEMON_FORCE_PRECISION);
7603  }
7604  }
7605  }
7606 }
7607 
7608 void CharacterManager::AdjustMitamaStats(const std::shared_ptr<
7609  objects::Demon>& demon, libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t>& stats,
7610  libcomp::DefinitionManager* definitionManager, uint8_t reunionMode,
7611  int32_t entityID, bool includeSetBonuses)
7612 {
7613  if(demon && demon->GetMitamaType() > 0)
7614  {
7615  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, std::list<int32_t>> bonusStats;
7616  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, std::list<int32_t>> deltaStats;
7617 
7618  // Add rank bonus
7619  uint32_t bonusID = (uint32_t)(((demon->GetMitamaType() - 1) * 16) +
7620  demon->GetMitamaRank());
7621  auto uBonus = definitionManager->GetMitamaUnionBonusData(bonusID);
7622  if(uBonus)
7623  {
7624  // Rank bonuses add up to a total sum at max level
7625  int8_t level = demon->GetCoreStats()->GetLevel();
7626  for(size_t i = 0; i < uBonus->BonusCount(); )
7627  {
7628  int32_t type = uBonus->GetBonus(i);
7629  int32_t val = 0;
7630 
7631  int32_t baseVal = uBonus->GetBonus((size_t)(i + 1));
7632  if(baseVal)
7633  {
7634  double valTotal = ceil(1.25 * pow(baseVal, 2) +
7635  (double)baseVal);
7636  val = (int32_t)round(((double)level / 99.0) * valTotal);
7637  }
7638 
7639  if(val)
7640  {
7641  bonusStats[(CorrectTbl)type].push_back(val);
7642  }
7643 
7644  i += 2;
7645  }
7646  }
7647 
7648  std::unordered_map<uint8_t, uint8_t> bonuses;
7649  std::set<uint32_t> setBonuses;
7650  if(GetMitamaBonuses(demon, definitionManager, bonuses, setBonuses,
7651  true))
7652  {
7653  // Add reunion bonuses
7654  for(auto& pair : bonuses)
7655  {
7656  auto rBonus = definitionManager->GetMitamaReunionBonusData(
7657  pair.first);
7658  if(rBonus)
7659  {
7660  int32_t type = rBonus->GetType();
7661  int32_t val = rBonus->GetValue();
7662  if(val)
7663  {
7664  for(uint8_t i = 0; i < pair.second; i++)
7665  {
7666  bonusStats[(CorrectTbl)type].push_back(val);
7667  }
7668  }
7669  }
7670  }
7671 
7672  if(setBonuses.size() > 0 && includeSetBonuses)
7673  {
7674  // Add reunion set bonuses
7675  auto state = entityID
7676  ? ClientState::GetEntityClientState(entityID) : nullptr;
7677  auto cState = state ? state->GetCharacterState() : nullptr;
7678  bool exBonus = cState && cState->SkillAvailable(
7679  SVR_CONST.MITAMA_SET_BOOST);
7680  for(auto& pair : definitionManager
7681  ->GetMitamaReunionSetBonusData())
7682  {
7683  if(setBonuses.find(pair.first) != setBonuses.end())
7684  {
7685  auto boost = exBonus ? pair.second->GetBonusEx()
7686  : pair.second->GetBonus();
7687  for(size_t i = 0; i < boost.size(); )
7688  {
7689  int32_t type = boost[i];
7690  int32_t val = boost[(size_t)(i + 1)];
7691  if(type >= 0 && val)
7692  {
7693  bonusStats[(CorrectTbl)type].push_back(val);
7694 
7695  // For active summoned demons, base stat deltas
7696  // need to be added as bonuses if we are
7697  // gathering non-base stats
7698  if(exBonus && reunionMode == 2 &&
7699  type <= (int32_t)CorrectTbl::LUCK)
7700  {
7701  int32_t delta = val -
7702  pair.second->GetBonus((size_t)(i + 1));
7703  deltaStats[(CorrectTbl)type].push_back(
7704  delta);
7705  }
7706  }
7707 
7708  i += 2;
7709  }
7710  }
7711  }
7712  }
7713  }
7714 
7715  if(reunionMode > 0)
7716  {
7717  // Filter only base (1) or non-base (2) stats
7718  std::set<uint8_t> removes;
7719  for(auto& pair : bonusStats)
7720  {
7721  bool baseStat = (uint8_t)pair.first <= (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::LUCK;
7722  if(baseStat != (reunionMode == 1))
7723  {
7724  removes.insert((uint8_t)pair.first);
7725  }
7726  }
7727 
7728  for(uint8_t remove : removes)
7729  {
7730  bonusStats.erase((CorrectTbl)remove);
7731  }
7732 
7733  for(auto& pair : deltaStats)
7734  {
7735  for(int32_t val : pair.second)
7736  {
7737  bonusStats[pair.first].push_back(val);
7738  }
7739  }
7740  }
7741 
7742  for(auto& pair : bonusStats)
7743  {
7744  if(stats.find(pair.first) == stats.end())
7745  {
7746  stats[pair.first] = 0;
7747  }
7748 
7749  for(int32_t val : pair.second)
7750  {
7751  stats[pair.first] = stats[pair.first] + val;
7752  }
7753  }
7754  }
7755 }
7756 
7757 bool CharacterManager::GetMitamaBonuses(const std::shared_ptr<
7758  objects::Demon>& demon, libcomp::DefinitionManager* definitionManager,
7759  std::unordered_map<uint8_t, uint8_t>& bonuses,
7760  std::set<uint32_t>& setBonuses, bool excludeTokusei)
7761 {
7762  bonuses.clear();
7763  setBonuses.clear();
7764 
7765  auto mReunion = demon->GetMitamaReunion();
7766 
7767  std::array<std::array<uint8_t, 4>, 12> mitamaMap;
7768  for(size_t i = 0; i < 12; i++)
7769  {
7770  mitamaMap[i] = { { 0, 0, 0, 0 } };
7771  }
7772 
7773  for(size_t i = 0; i < 96; i++)
7774  {
7775  uint8_t bonus = mReunion[i];
7776  if(bonus)
7777  {
7778  uint8_t rIdx = (uint8_t)(i / 8);
7779  uint8_t mIdx = (uint8_t)(bonus / 32);
7780  mitamaMap[rIdx][mIdx]++;
7781 
7782  if(bonuses.find(bonus) != bonuses.end())
7783  {
7784  bonuses[bonus]++;
7785  }
7786  else
7787  {
7788  bonuses[bonus] = 1;
7789  }
7790  }
7791  }
7792 
7793  if(bonuses.size() > 0)
7794  {
7795  for(auto& pair : definitionManager->GetMitamaReunionSetBonusData())
7796  {
7797  // Four sets exist for each reunion
7798  size_t rIdx = (size_t)(pair.first / 4);
7799  if(rIdx < 12)
7800  {
7801  bool active = true;
7802 
7803  auto set = pair.second;
7804  for(size_t mIdx = 0; mIdx < 4; mIdx++)
7805  {
7806  active &= mitamaMap[rIdx][mIdx] >=
7807  set->GetMitamaRequirements(mIdx);
7808  }
7809 
7810  if(active && (!excludeTokusei || set->GetBonus(0) >= 0))
7811  {
7812  setBonuses.insert(pair.first);
7813  }
7814  }
7815  }
7816 
7817  return true;
7818  }
7819 
7820  return false;
7821 }
7822 
7823 std::list<int32_t> CharacterManager::GetMitamaIndirectSetBonuses(
7824  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon>& demon,
7825  libcomp::DefinitionManager* definitionManager, bool exBonus,
7826  int8_t& magReduction)
7827 {
7828  int32_t setReduction = 0;
7829  std::list<int32_t> tokuseiIDs;
7830  std::unordered_map<uint8_t, uint8_t> bonuses;
7831  std::set<uint32_t> setBonuses;
7832  if(demon->GetMitamaType() && GetMitamaBonuses(demon, definitionManager,
7833  bonuses, setBonuses, false))
7834  {
7835  for(auto& pair : definitionManager->GetMitamaReunionSetBonusData())
7836  {
7837  if(setBonuses.find(pair.first) != setBonuses.end())
7838  {
7839  auto boost = exBonus ? pair.second->GetBonusEx()
7840  : pair.second->GetBonus();
7841  for(size_t i = 0; i < boost.size(); )
7842  {
7843  int32_t type = boost[i];
7844  int32_t val = boost[(size_t)(i + 1)];
7845  if(type == -1 && val)
7846  {
7847  tokuseiIDs.push_back(val);
7848  }
7849  else if(type == -2)
7850  {
7851  setReduction += val;
7852  }
7853 
7854  i += 2;
7855  }
7856  }
7857  }
7858  }
7859 
7860  magReduction = setReduction > 100 ? 100 : (int8_t)setReduction;
7861 
7862  return tokuseiIDs;
7863 }
7864 
7865 int8_t CharacterManager::CalculateMagReduction(
7866  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
7867  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon>& demon)
7868 {
7869  if(!demon)
7870  {
7871  return 0;
7872  }
7873 
7874  int32_t magReduction = (int32_t)demon->GetMagReduction();
7875  if(magReduction < 100 && demon->GetMitamaType())
7876  {
7877  auto cState = client
7878  ? client->GetClientState()->GetCharacterState() : nullptr;
7879  bool exBonus = cState && cState->SkillAvailable(
7880  SVR_CONST.MITAMA_SET_BOOST);
7881 
7882  int8_t setReduction = 0;
7883  CharacterManager::GetMitamaIndirectSetBonuses(demon,
7884  mServer.lock()->GetDefinitionManager(), exBonus, setReduction);
7885 
7886  magReduction = (int32_t)(magReduction + setReduction);
7887  }
7888 
7889  return magReduction > 100 ? 100 : (int8_t)magReduction;
7890 }
7891 
7892 std::set<uint32_t> CharacterManager::GetTraitSkills(
7893  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon>& demon,
7894  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilData>& demonData,
7895  libcomp::DefinitionManager* definitionManager)
7896 {
7897  std::set<uint32_t> skillIDs;
7898 
7899  auto growth = demonData->GetGrowth();
7900  for(size_t i = 0; i < 4; i++)
7901  {
7902  auto equipment = demon->GetEquippedItems(i).Get();
7903  uint32_t traitID = growth->GetTraits(i);
7904  if(equipment)
7905  {
7906  auto equipData = definitionManager->GetDevilEquipmentItemData(
7907  equipment->GetType());
7908  if(equipData)
7909  {
7910  skillIDs.insert(equipData->GetSkillID());
7911  }
7912  }
7913  else if(traitID)
7914  {
7915  skillIDs.insert(traitID);
7916  }
7917  }
7918 
7919  return skillIDs;
7920 }
7921 
7922 libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t> CharacterManager::GetCharacterBaseStats(
7923  const std::shared_ptr<objects::EntityStats>& cs)
7924 {
7925  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t> stats;
7926  for(size_t i = 0; i < 126; i++)
7927  {
7928  CorrectTbl tblID = (CorrectTbl)i;
7929  stats[tblID] = 0;
7930  }
7931 
7932  stats[CorrectTbl::STR] = cs->GetSTR();
7933  stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] = cs->GetMAGIC();
7934  stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] = cs->GetVIT();
7935  stats[CorrectTbl::INT] = cs->GetINTEL();
7936  stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] = cs->GetSPEED();
7937  stats[CorrectTbl::LUCK] = cs->GetLUCK();
7938  stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] = 70;
7939  stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] = 10;
7940  stats[CorrectTbl::HP_REGEN] = 1;
7941  stats[CorrectTbl::MP_REGEN] = 1;
7942  stats[CorrectTbl::MOVE1] = (int32_t)(STAT_DEFAULT_SPEED / 2);
7943  stats[CorrectTbl::MOVE2] = STAT_DEFAULT_SPEED;
7944  stats[CorrectTbl::SUMMON_SPEED] = 0;
7945  stats[CorrectTbl::KNOCKBACK_RESIST] = 61;
7946  stats[CorrectTbl::COOLDOWN_TIME] = 100;
7947  stats[CorrectTbl::RES_STATUS] = 100;
7948  stats[CorrectTbl::LB_DAMAGE] = 100;
7949  stats[CorrectTbl::CHANT_TIME] = 100;
7950 
7951  // Default all the rates to 100%
7952  for(uint8_t i = (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_XP;
7953  i <= (uint8_t)CorrectTbl::RATE_HEAL_TAKEN; i++)
7954  {
7955  stats[(CorrectTbl)i] = 100;
7956  }
7957 
7958  stats[CorrectTbl::RATE_PC] = 100;
7959  stats[CorrectTbl::RATE_DEMON] = 100;
7960  stats[CorrectTbl::RATE_PC_TAKEN] = 100;
7961  stats[CorrectTbl::RATE_DEMON_TAKEN] = 100;
7962 
7963  return stats;
7964 }
7965 
7966 void CharacterManager::CalculateDependentStats(
7967  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t>& stats, int8_t level, bool isDemon)
7968 {
7970  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t> adjusted;
7971  if(isDemon)
7972  {
7973  // Round up each part
7974  adjusted[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] +
7975  (int32_t)ceill(stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] * 0.03 * level) +
7976  (int32_t)ceill(stats[CorrectTbl::STR] * 0.3) +
7977  (int32_t)ceill(((stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] * 0.01) + 0.5) * stats[CorrectTbl::VIT]));
7978  adjusted[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] +
7979  (int32_t)ceill(stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] * 0.03 * level) +
7980  (int32_t)ceill(stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] * 0.3) +
7981  (int32_t)ceill(((stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] * 0.01) + 0.5) * stats[CorrectTbl::INT]));
7982 
7983  // Round the result, adjusting by 0.5
7984  adjusted[CorrectTbl::CLSR] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] +
7985  (int32_t)roundl((stats[CorrectTbl::STR] * 0.5) + 0.5 + (level * 0.1)));
7986  adjusted[CorrectTbl::LNGR] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] +
7987  (int32_t)roundl((stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] * 0.5) + 0.5 + (level * 0.1)));
7988  adjusted[CorrectTbl::SPELL] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] +
7989  (int32_t)roundl((stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] * 0.5) + 0.5 + (level * 0.1)));
7990  adjusted[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT] +
7991  (int32_t)roundl((stats[CorrectTbl::INT] * 0.5) + 0.5 + (level * 0.1)));
7992  adjusted[CorrectTbl::PDEF] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::PDEF] +
7993  (int32_t)roundl((stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] * 0.1) + 0.5 + (level * 0.1)));
7994  adjusted[CorrectTbl::MDEF] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::MDEF] +
7995  (int32_t)roundl((stats[CorrectTbl::INT] * 0.1) + 0.5 + (level * 0.1)));
7996  }
7997  else
7998  {
7999  // Round each part
8000  adjusted[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] +
8001  (int32_t)roundl(stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] * 0.03 * level) +
8002  (int32_t)roundl(stats[CorrectTbl::STR] * 0.3) +
8003  (int32_t)roundl(((stats[CorrectTbl::HP_MAX] * 0.01) + 0.5) * stats[CorrectTbl::VIT]));
8004  adjusted[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] +
8005  (int32_t)roundl(stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] * 0.03 * level) +
8006  (int32_t)roundl(stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] * 0.3) +
8007  (int32_t)roundl(((stats[CorrectTbl::MP_MAX] * 0.01) + 0.5) * stats[CorrectTbl::INT]));
8008 
8009  // Round the results down
8010  adjusted[CorrectTbl::CLSR] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::CLSR] +
8011  (int32_t)floorl((stats[CorrectTbl::STR] * 0.5) + (level * 0.1)));
8012  adjusted[CorrectTbl::LNGR] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::LNGR] +
8013  (int32_t)floorl((stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] * 0.5) + (level * 0.1)));
8014  adjusted[CorrectTbl::SPELL] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::SPELL] +
8015  (int32_t)floorl((stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] * 0.5) + (level * 0.1)));
8016  adjusted[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::SUPPORT] +
8017  (int32_t)floorl((stats[CorrectTbl::INT] * 0.5) + (level * 0.1)));
8018  adjusted[CorrectTbl::PDEF] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::PDEF] +
8019  (int32_t)floorl((stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] * 0.1) + (level * 0.1)));
8020  adjusted[CorrectTbl::MDEF] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::MDEF] +
8021  (int32_t)floorl((stats[CorrectTbl::INT] * 0.1) + (level * 0.1)));
8022  }
8023 
8024  for(auto pair : adjusted)
8025  {
8026  // Since any negative value used for a calculation here is not valid, any result
8027  // in a negative value should be treated as an overflow and be set to max
8028  if(pair.second < 0)
8029  {
8030  stats[pair.first] = std::numeric_limits<int32_t>::max();
8031  }
8032  else
8033  {
8034  stats[pair.first] = pair.second;
8035  }
8036  }
8037 
8038  // Calculate incant/cooldown time decrease adjustments
8039  int32_t chantAdjust = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::CHANT_TIME] -
8040  (int32_t)floor(2.5 * floor(stats[CorrectTbl::INT] * 0.1) +
8041  1.5 * floor(stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] * 0.1)));
8042  int32_t coolAdjust = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::COOLDOWN_TIME] -
8043  (int32_t)floor(2.5 * floor(stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] * 0.1) +
8044  1.5 * floor(stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] * 0.1)));
8045  stats[CorrectTbl::CHANT_TIME] = (int32_t)(chantAdjust < 0 ? 0 : chantAdjust);
8046  stats[CorrectTbl::COOLDOWN_TIME] = (int32_t)(coolAdjust < 5 ? 5 : coolAdjust);
8047 }
8048 
8049 void CharacterManager::AdjustStatBounds(libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t>& stats,
8050  bool limitMax)
8051 {
8052  static libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int16_t> minStats =
8053  {
8054  { CorrectTbl::HP_MAX, 1 },
8055  { CorrectTbl::MP_MAX, 1 },
8056  { CorrectTbl::CLSR, 0 },
8057  { CorrectTbl::LNGR, 0 },
8058  { CorrectTbl::SPELL, 0 },
8059  { CorrectTbl::SUPPORT, 0 },
8060  { CorrectTbl::PDEF, 0 },
8061  { CorrectTbl::MDEF, 0 },
8062  { CorrectTbl::HP_REGEN, 0 },
8063  { CorrectTbl::MP_REGEN, 0 },
8064  { CorrectTbl::COOLDOWN_TIME, 5 },
8065  { CorrectTbl::CHANT_TIME, 0 },
8066  { CorrectTbl::RATE_PC, 0 },
8067  { CorrectTbl::RATE_DEMON, 0 },
8068  { CorrectTbl::RATE_PC_TAKEN, 0 },
8069  { CorrectTbl::RATE_DEMON_TAKEN, 0 },
8070 
8071  // Core stats can actually reach zero even though its uncommon
8072  { CorrectTbl::STR, 0 },
8073  { CorrectTbl::MAGIC, 0 },
8074  { CorrectTbl::VIT, 0 },
8075  { CorrectTbl::INT, 0 },
8076  { CorrectTbl::SPEED, 0 },
8077  { CorrectTbl::LUCK, 0 }
8078  };
8079 
8080  static libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int16_t> maxStats =
8081  {
8082  { CorrectTbl::HP_MAX, MAX_PLAYER_HP_MP },
8083  { CorrectTbl::MP_MAX, MAX_PLAYER_HP_MP },
8084  { CorrectTbl::STR, 999 },
8085  { CorrectTbl::MAGIC, 999 },
8086  { CorrectTbl::VIT, 999 },
8087  { CorrectTbl::INT, 999 },
8088  { CorrectTbl::SPEED, 999 },
8089  { CorrectTbl::LUCK, 999 }
8090  };
8091 
8092  // All non-HP/MP max stats are limited to 16-bit integer min/max
8093  for(auto& pair : stats)
8094  {
8095  if(pair.second > (int32_t)std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::max())
8096  {
8097  if(pair.first != CorrectTbl::HP_MAX &&
8098  pair.first != CorrectTbl::MP_MAX)
8099  {
8100  pair.second = std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::max();
8101  }
8102  }
8103  else if(pair.second <
8104  (int32_t)std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::min())
8105  {
8106  pair.second = std::numeric_limits<int16_t>::min();
8107  }
8108  }
8109 
8110  for(auto& pair : minStats)
8111  {
8112  auto it = stats.find(pair.first);
8113  if(it != stats.end() && it->second < (int32_t)pair.second)
8114  {
8115  stats[pair.first] = pair.second;
8116  }
8117  }
8118 
8119  if(limitMax)
8120  {
8121  for(auto& pair : maxStats)
8122  {
8123  auto it = stats.find(pair.first);
8124  if(it != stats.end() && it->second > (int32_t)pair.second)
8125  {
8126  stats[pair.first] = pair.second;
8127  }
8128  }
8129  }
8130 }
8131 
8132 uint32_t CharacterManager::GetDemonPresent(uint32_t demonType, int8_t level,
8133  uint16_t familiarity, int8_t& rarity) const
8134 {
8135  // Presents are only given for the top 2 ranks
8136  if(GetFamiliarityRank(familiarity) < 3)
8137  {
8138  return 0;
8139  }
8140 
8141  auto server = mServer.lock();
8142  auto definitionManager = server->GetDefinitionManager();
8143  auto serverDataManager = server->GetServerDataManager();
8144 
8145  auto demonDef = definitionManager->GetDevilData(demonType);
8146  uint32_t baseType = demonDef
8147  ? demonDef->GetUnionData()->GetBaseDemonID() : 0;
8148 
8149  // Pull direct demon definition, else base demon definition
8150  auto presentDef = serverDataManager->GetDemonPresentData(demonType);
8151  if(!presentDef && demonType != baseType)
8152  {
8153  presentDef = serverDataManager->GetDemonPresentData(baseType);
8154  }
8155 
8156  if(demonDef && presentDef)
8157  {
8158  // Attempt to pull presents from rares then uncommons, then commons
8159  std::array<std::list<uint32_t>, 3> presents;
8160  presents[0] = presentDef->GetRareItems();
8161  presents[1] = presentDef->GetUncommonItems();
8162  presents[2] = presentDef->GetCommonItems();
8163 
8164  uint8_t baseLevel = demonDef->GetGrowth()->GetBaseLevel();
8165 
8166  // Rates for uncommons and rares start at 0% at base level and increase
8167  // to a maximum of 25% and 15% respectively up to max level
8168  double rng = 0.0;
8169  double rateSum = 0.0;
8170  for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++)
8171  {
8172  bool useSet = false;
8173  if(i == 2)
8174  {
8175  // If we get to the common set, use by default
8176  useSet = true;
8177  }
8178  else if(level - baseLevel > 0)
8179  {
8180  uint8_t minLevel = 0;
8181  double maxRate = 0.0;
8182  if(i == 0)
8183  {
8184  // Rare set
8185  minLevel = (uint8_t)(baseLevel + ceil((100.0 -
8186  (double)baseLevel) / 5.0));
8187  maxRate = 15.0;
8188  }
8189  else
8190  {
8191  // Uncommon set
8192  minLevel = (uint8_t)(baseLevel + ceil((100.0 -
8193  (double)baseLevel) / 10.0));
8194  maxRate = 25.0;
8195  }
8196 
8197  if(minLevel <= (uint8_t)level)
8198  {
8199  double rate = (((double)(level - minLevel) + 1.0) /
8200  (100.0 - (double)minLevel) * maxRate) + rateSum;
8201 
8202  if(rate > 0.0)
8203  {
8204  if(rng == 0.0)
8205  {
8206  rng = (double)RNG(uint16_t, 1, 10000) * 0.01;
8207  }
8208 
8209  if(rng <= rate)
8210  {
8211  useSet = true;
8212  }
8213  }
8214 
8215  // Don't run RNG multiple times (not getting a rare
8216  // technically increases your odds of getting an uncommon)
8217  rateSum += rate;
8218  }
8219  }
8220 
8221  // Use an even distribution between all items in the same set
8222  if(useSet && presents[i].size() > 0)
8223  {
8224  rarity = (int8_t)(2 - i);
8225  if(presents[i].size() == 1)
8226  {
8227  return presents[i].front();
8228  }
8229  else
8230  {
8231  return libcomp::Randomizer::GetEntry(presents[i]);
8232  }
8233  }
8234  }
8235  }
8236 
8237  return 0;
8238 }
8239 
8240 void CharacterManager::GetDemonPacketData(libcomp::Packet& p,
8241  const std::shared_ptr<channel::ChannelClientConnection>& client,
8242  const std::shared_ptr<objects::DemonBox>& box, int8_t slot)
8243 {
8244  auto state = client->GetClientState();
8245  auto demon = box->GetDemons((size_t)slot).Get();
8246 
8247  p.WriteS8(slot);
8248  p.WriteS64Little(nullptr != demon
8249  ? state->GetObjectID(demon->GetUUID()) : -1);
8250 
8251  if(nullptr != demon)
8252  {
8253  auto cs = demon->GetCoreStats();
8254  p.WriteU32Little(demon->GetType());
8255  p.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cs->GetMaxHP());
8256  p.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cs->GetMaxMP());
8257  p.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cs->GetHP());
8258  p.WriteS16Little((int16_t)cs->GetMP());
8259  p.WriteS8(cs->GetLevel());
8260  p.WriteU8(demon->GetLocked() ? 1 : 0);
8261 
8262  uint32_t dgCdTime = 0;
8263  const uint32_t dgCdStatus = SVR_CONST.STATUS_DIGITALIZE_COOLDOWN;
8264 
8265  UpdateStatusEffects(demon, state->GetAccountUID(), true);
8266 
8267  size_t statusEffectCount = demon->StatusEffectsCount();
8268  p.WriteS32Little(static_cast<int32_t>(statusEffectCount));
8269  for(auto effect : demon->GetStatusEffects())
8270  {
8271  p.WriteU32Little(effect->GetEffect());
8272 
8273  if(effect->GetEffect() == dgCdStatus)
8274  {
8275  dgCdTime = effect->GetExpiration();
8276  }
8277  }
8278 
8279  p.WriteS8(CalculateMagReduction(client, demon));
8280 
8281  bool equipped = false;
8282  for(auto equip : demon->GetEquippedItems())
8283  {
8284  if(!equip.IsNull())
8285  {
8286  equipped = true;
8287  break;
8288  }
8289  }
8290 
8291  p.WriteS8(equipped ? 1 : 0);
8292 
8293  p.WriteS32Little(ChannelServer::GetExpirationInSeconds(dgCdTime));
8294  }
8295 }
8296 
8297 void CharacterManager::GetItemDetailPacketData(libcomp::Packet& p,
8298  const std::shared_ptr<objects::Item>& item, uint8_t detailLevel)
8299 {
8300  if(item)
8301  {
8302  if(detailLevel >= 1)
8303  {
8304  if(detailLevel >= 2)
8305  {
8306  p.WriteU32Little(item->GetType());
8307  p.WriteU16Little(item->GetStackSize());
8308  }
8309 
8310  p.WriteU16Little(item->GetDurability());
8311  p.WriteS8(item->GetMaxDurability());
8312  }
8313 
8314  p.WriteS16Little(item->GetTarot());
8315  p.WriteS16Little(item->GetSoul());
8316 
8317  for(auto modSlot : item->GetModSlots())
8318  {
8319  p.WriteU16Little(modSlot);
8320  }
8321 
8322  if(detailLevel >= 1)
8323  {
8324  p.WriteS32Little((int32_t)item->GetRentalExpiration());
8325  }
8326 
8327  auto basicEffect = item->GetBasicEffect();
8328  p.WriteU32Little(basicEffect ? basicEffect
8329  : static_cast<uint32_t>(-1));
8330 
8331  auto specialEffect = item->GetSpecialEffect();
8332  p.WriteU32Little(specialEffect ? specialEffect
8333  : static_cast<uint32_t>(-1));
8334 
8335  for(auto bonus : item->GetFuseBonuses())
8336  {
8337  p.WriteS8(bonus);
8338  }
8339  }
8340  else
8341  {
8342  switch(detailLevel)
8343  {
8344  case 2:
8345  p.WriteBlank(27);
8346  break;
8347  case 1:
8348  p.WriteBlank(21);
8349  break;
8350  case 0:
8351  default:
8352  p.WriteBlank(14);
8353  break;
8354  }
8355 
8356  p.WriteU32Little(static_cast<uint32_t>(-1));
8357  p.WriteU32Little(static_cast<uint32_t>(-1));
8358  p.WriteBlank(3);
8359  }
8360 }
8361 
8362 void CharacterManager::GetEntityStatsPacketData(libcomp::Packet& p,
8363  const std::shared_ptr<objects::EntityStats>& coreStats,
8364  const std::shared_ptr<ActiveEntityState>& state, uint8_t format,
8365  libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t> coreBoosts)
8366 {
8367  auto baseOnly = state == nullptr;
8368 
8369  switch(format)
8370  {
8371  case 0:
8372  case 1:
8373  {
8374  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetSTR());
8375  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(baseOnly
8376  ? coreBoosts[CorrectTbl::STR]
8377  : (state->GetSTR() - coreStats->GetSTR())));
8378  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetMAGIC());
8379  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(baseOnly
8380  ? coreBoosts[CorrectTbl::MAGIC]
8381  : (state->GetMAGIC() - coreStats->GetMAGIC())));
8382  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetVIT());
8383  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(baseOnly
8384  ? coreBoosts[CorrectTbl::VIT]
8385  : (state->GetVIT() - coreStats->GetVIT())));
8386  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetINTEL());
8387  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(baseOnly
