8388  ? coreBoosts[CorrectTbl::INT]
8389  : (state->GetINTEL() - coreStats->GetINTEL())));
8390  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetSPEED());
8391  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(baseOnly
8392  ? coreBoosts[CorrectTbl::SPEED]
8393  : (state->GetSPEED() - coreStats->GetSPEED())));
8394  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetLUCK());
8395  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(baseOnly
8396  ? coreBoosts[CorrectTbl::LUCK]
8397  : (state->GetLUCK() - coreStats->GetLUCK())));
8398 
8399  if(format == 1)
8400  {
8401  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8402  baseOnly ? coreStats->GetMaxHP() : state->GetMaxHP()));
8403  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8404  baseOnly ? coreStats->GetMaxMP() : state->GetMaxMP()));
8405  }
8406 
8407  if(baseOnly)
8408  {
8409  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetCLSR());
8410  p.WriteS16Little(0);
8411  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetLNGR());
8412  p.WriteS16Little(0);
8413  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetSPELL());
8414  p.WriteS16Little(0);
8415  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetSUPPORT());
8416  p.WriteS16Little(0);
8417  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetPDEF());
8418  p.WriteS16Little(0);
8419  p.WriteS16Little(coreStats->GetMDEF());
8420  p.WriteS16Little(0);
8421  }
8422  else
8423  {
8424  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetCLSRBase());
8425  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(state->GetCLSR() -
8426  state->GetCLSRBase()));
8427  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetLNGRBase());
8428  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(state->GetLNGR() -
8429  state->GetLNGRBase()));
8430  p.WriteS16Little( state->GetSPELLBase());
8431  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(state->GetSPELL() -
8432  state->GetSPELLBase()));
8433  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetSUPPORTBase());
8434  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(state->GetSUPPORT() -
8435  state->GetSUPPORTBase()));
8436  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetPDEFBase());
8437  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(state->GetPDEF() -
8438  state->GetPDEFBase()));
8439  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetMDEFBase());
8440  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(state->GetMDEF() -
8441  state->GetMDEFBase()));
8442  }
8443  }
8444  break;
8445  case 2:
8446  case 3:
8447  {
8448  // Non-adjusted recalc format makes no sense
8449  if(baseOnly) break;
8450 
8451  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8452  state->GetSTR() - coreStats->GetSTR()));
8453  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8454  state->GetMAGIC() - coreStats->GetMAGIC()));
8455  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8456  state->GetVIT() - coreStats->GetVIT()));
8457  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8458  state->GetINTEL() - coreStats->GetINTEL()));
8459  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8460  state->GetSPEED() - coreStats->GetSPEED()));
8461  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8462  state->GetLUCK() - coreStats->GetLUCK()));
8463  p.WriteS16Little((int16_t)state->GetMaxHP());
8464  p.WriteS16Little((int16_t)state->GetMaxMP());
8465  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8466  state->GetCLSR() - state->GetCLSRBase()));
8467  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8468  state->GetLNGR() - state->GetLNGRBase()));
8469  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8470  state->GetSPELL() - state->GetSPELLBase()));
8471  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8472  state->GetSUPPORT() - state->GetSUPPORTBase()));
8473  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8474  state->GetPDEF() - state->GetPDEFBase()));
8475  p.WriteS16Little(static_cast<int16_t>(
8476  state->GetMDEF() - state->GetMDEFBase()));
8477 
8478  if(format == 3)
8479  {
8480  // Unknown
8481  if(std::dynamic_pointer_cast<CharacterState>(state))
8482  {
8483  p.WriteS16(-5600);
8484  p.WriteS16(5600);
8485  }
8486  else
8487  {
8488  p.WriteS16(0);
8489  p.WriteS16(0);
8490  }
8491  }
8492 
8493  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetCLSRBase());
8494  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetLNGRBase());
8495  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetSPELLBase());
8496  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetSUPPORTBase());
8497  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetPDEFBase());
8498  p.WriteS16Little(state->GetMDEFBase());
8499  }
8500  break;
8501  default:
8502  break;
8503  }
8504 }
8505 
8506 void CharacterManager::DeleteDemon(const std::shared_ptr<objects::Demon>& demon,
8507  const std::shared_ptr<libcomp::DatabaseChangeSet>& changes)
8508 {
8509  auto box = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::DemonBox>(
8510  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(demon->GetDemonBox()));
8511  if(box && box->GetDemons((size_t)demon->GetBoxSlot()).Get() == demon)
8512  {
8513  box->SetDemons((size_t)demon->GetBoxSlot(), NULLUUID);
8514  changes->Update(box);
8515 
8516  if(demon->GetHasQuest())
8517  {
8518  // End the demon quest if it belongs to the demon
8519  auto account = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Account>(
8520  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(box->GetAccount()));
8521  auto character = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<objects::Character>(
8522  libcomp::PersistentObject::GetObjectByUUID(box->GetCharacter()));
8523  auto dQuest = character ? character->GetDemonQuest().Get() : nullptr;
8524  if(account && dQuest && dQuest->GetDemon() == demon->GetUUID())
8525  {
8526  auto server = mServer.lock();
8527  auto client = server->GetManagerConnection()
8528  ->GetClientConnection(account->GetUsername());
8529  if(client)
8530  {
8531  server->GetEventManager()->EndDemonQuest(client);
8532  }
8533  }
8534  }
8535  }
8536 
8537  changes->Delete(demon);
8538  changes->Delete(demon->GetCoreStats().Get());
8539 
8540  for(auto iSkill : demon->GetInheritedSkills())
8541  {
8542  changes->Delete(iSkill.Get());
8543  }
8544 
8545  for(auto effect : demon->GetStatusEffects())
8546  {
8547  changes->Delete(effect.Get());
8548  }
8549 }
8550 
8551 void CharacterManager::BoostStats(libcomp::EnumMap<CorrectTbl, int32_t>& stats,
8552  const std::shared_ptr<objects::MiDevilLVUpData>& data, int boostLevel)
8553 {
8554  stats[CorrectTbl::STR] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::STR] +
8555  (int32_t)(data->GetSTR() * boostLevel));
8556  stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::MAGIC] +
8557  (int32_t)(data->GetMAGIC() * boostLevel));
8558  stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::VIT] +
8559  (int32_t)(data->GetVIT() * boostLevel));
8560  stats[CorrectTbl::INT] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::INT] +
8561  (int32_t)(data->GetINTEL() * boostLevel));
8562  stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::SPEED] +
8563  (int32_t)(data->GetSPEED() * boostLevel));
8564  stats[CorrectTbl::LUCK] = (int32_t)(stats[CorrectTbl::LUCK] +
8565  (int32_t)(data->GetLUCK() * boostLevel));
8566 }
